Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Jetforce Pro 25L Backpack
Product.Long_Description: Black Diamond's Jetforce Pro is a ski-specific touring backpack built with an avalanche airbag for backcountry terrain. Black Diamond redesigned the Jetforce Pro airbag this season. Its rechargeable, fan-based, electronic system is now lighter, smaller, and placed in a more convenient location for packing. The travel-friendly lithium battery includes an LED battery indicator, automatic self-diagnosis tests, and the ability to deploy multiple times on a single charge. The bag features puncture-resistance, automatic deflation, and multiple deployments should one fail during a slide. It's also Bluetooth-compatible to the Pieps App for system analysis and updates. The pack itself caters to a variety of backcountry skiers for dawn patrols, hut trips, and mountaineering missions. It can carry skis diagonally, and the straps tuck away for the downhill. This sleek, streamlined pack also includes carry systems for a helmet, ice axe, avalanche gear, and more. Its 25L capacity is completely modular so you can add Black Diamond's Booster Packs (sold separately) to add more storage for longer tours.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Jetforce Pro 10L Backpack
Product.Long_Description: The Black Diamond Jetforce Pro 10L Backpack is a ski-specific touring backpack built with an avalanche airbag for backcountry terrain. Black Diamond redesigned the Jetforce Pro airbag this season with a lighter, smaller, rechargeable, fan-based, electronic system that's now in a more convenient location for easier packing. The travel-friendly lithium battery includes an LED battery indicator, automatic self-diagnosis tests, and the ability to deploy multiple times on a single charge. The bag features puncture-resistance, automatic deflation, and multiple deployments should one fail during a slide. It's also Bluetooth-compatible to the Pieps App for system analysis and updates. The pack itself caters to a variety of backcountry skiers for quick dawn patrols, hot laps, and even some randos. It can carry skis diagonally, and the straps tuck away for the downhill. This sleek, streamlined pack also includes carry systems for a helmet, ice axe, avalanche gear, and more. Its 10L capacity is completely modular so you can add Black Diamond's Booster Packs (sold separately) to add more storage for longer tours.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Jetforce Pro Split 25L Backpack
Product.Long_Description: The splitboarders among us trust the Jetforce Pro Split 25L Backpack and its splitboard-specific design for venturing out into unpredictable backcountry terrain. Not only does it include a redesigned Jetforce Pro airbag, but the airbag's deployment is designed to function with a snowboard strapped vertically. This bag features an electronically deployed airbag system with a rechargeable battery that deploys inherently faster than compressed air systems and takes up less space in our packs. Its also more travel-friendly, since compressed air systems must be unpressurized before flying.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Bombshelter Tent: 4-Person 4-Season
Product.Long_Description: The Black Diamond Bombshelter is a state-of-the-art, four-person, four-season single-wall tent with a storm-proof design. Aconcagua? Yeah, been there. Everest? Sure, done that. What about gusting winds and four feet of snow? Yep, the Bombshelter can handle that, too. True to its name, this tent is virtually unbeatable in the mountains, or anywhere for that matter. When we're looking for the ideal team-mountaineering or base-camp tent, it's hard to find one that's stronger or lighter than the Bombshelter.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Helio Carbon 115 Ski - 2025
Product.Long_Description: The Helio Carbon collection of backcountry skis consists of Black Diamond's lightest planks for alpine touring, and the Helio Carbon 114 Ski is most powder-hungry in the bunch. As the widest Helio Carbon, this ski certainly has a penchant for powder but can rip icy chutes or aprons with variable snow as well as powder. Black Diamond designed it with an early rise at the tip so we can navigate deep powder with ease whether we're on the skin track or the descent, and a bit of camber underfoot works with the slightly rockered tail to employ a versatile performance whether we're edging down icy couloirs or cruising spring crud.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Helio Carbon 104 Ski - 2025
Product.Long_Description: The Helio Carbon collection of backcountry skis consists of Black Diamond's lightest planks for alpine touring, and we think the Helio Carbon 104 Ski is one of the most versatile in the bunch. The second-widest Helio Carbon, this ski certainly has a penchant for powder but can rip icy chutes or aprons with variable snow as well as powder. Black Diamond designed it with an early rise at the tip so we can navigate deep powder with ease whether we're on the skin track or the descent, and a bit of camber underfoot works with the slightly rockered tail to employ a versatile performance whether we're edging down icy couloirs or cruising spring crud.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Impulse 112 Ti Skis - 2025
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"The Impulse 112 Ti is the perfect mix of playful and powerful. The wide waist and rockered tips make it super fun in deep snow, while the Titanal layer gives me confidence when charging steep, aggressive lines. It's my go-to for stormy freeride days."Designed for freeriders who love deep snow but demand control on aggressive terrain, the Black Diamond Impulse 112 Ti Skis offer the ultimate blend of playfulness and power. The 112mm waist delivers incredible float in soft snow, while a rockered tip and tail make tight turns in trees and chutes effortless. Built in Austria, the Impulse 112 features a poplar core and pre-preg fiberglass layup for consistent flex and responsiveness. A sheet of Titanal adds unmatched stability and dampness, ensuring you can charge hard and stay in control through variable conditions. Flat-top construction and full ABS sidewalls increase torsional stiffness and power, making these skis ideal for freeriders tackling steep lines and big-mountain descents. Whether carving through powder or navigating challenging terrain, the Impulse 112 Ti is built to keep you charging confidently.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Impulse Pro 114 Ti Skis -2025
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"The Impulse Pro 114 Ti is my go-to for deep powder days and stormy freeride missions. Its 114mm waist provides insane float, while the Titanal layer adds the power and stability I need to handle hard landings and chop. Despite its size, the rocker profile keeps it agile in tight spaces."For storm days, deep powder, and massive freeride lines, the Black Diamond Impulse Pro 114 Ti Skis are in a class of their own. With a wide 114mm waist and rocker at the tip and tail, these skis float effortlessly through soft snow, while the traditional camber underfoot maintains edge hold when conditions firm up. Built in Austria with a poplar wood core and pre-preg fiberglass, the Impulse Pro 114 is designed for strength, responsiveness, and durability. The added sheet of Titanal enhances dampness and stability, letting us stomp landings and blast through crud with confidence. Flat-top construction and full ABS sidewalls increase power and torsional stiffness, so we stay in control even when pushing the limits. Whether straight-lining an apron or navigating tight chutes, these skis deliver the precision, float, and stability that freeriders demand on their biggest days.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Jetforce UL 26L Backpack
Product.Long_Description: Just over four pounds, the Jetforce UL 26L Backpack is Black Diamond's lightest backcountry pack with an included avalanche airbag system. New to the season, Black Diamond's Alpride 2. 0 system utilizes two small cartridges combining compressed argon and CO2 gasses that weigh less than the original Jetforce fan and still inflates in a mere five seconds. The deploy trigger can switch to either shoulder strap, and it's personally adjustable to your preferences. The front compartment stores required gear for backcountry travel, leaving room in the 26L main compartment for a full day's worth of essentials. Black Diamond designed the pack itself to complement the Alpride avalanche system's lightness with minimalism and just the necessary amount of features for touring, bootpacking, and easier mountaineering. The ice axe carry is removable if you want to shed a gram or two, and the diagonal ski carry and helmet holder stow away for a solid look skiing downhill.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Helio Carbon 95 Ski - 2025
Product.Long_Description: The Helio Carbon collection of backcountry skis consists of Black Diamond's lightest planks for alpine touring, and the Helio Carbon 95 Ski is the most versatile option we go for when it comes to skiing soft and hard snow. A 95mm waist places this ski in the middle of the Helio Carbon collection. Its optimal balance in powder and firmer snow is further complemented by the camber underfoot and early rise rocker that initiates solid edge control down icy couloirs, and then surfs in deep pow. The Helio Carbon is made of light paulownia wood and a pre-preg carbon layup for increased stiffness at the lowest weight possible.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Helio Carbon 88 Ski - 2025
Product.Long_Description: Your destination is only limited by the altitude of the mountains around you, so strap on skis built to soar to new heights with Black Diamond's Helio Carbon 88. These ultralight carbon fiber skis are built for pursuing high alpine adventures and long-distance tours, thanks to a layup that damps vibrations and holds strong when you point things downhill.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Impulse 104 Ski - 2024
Product.Long_Description: Even when the weather is seeming predictable and snow conditions seem mellow you can never be sure of what you are gonna find on hill. This is why we turn to the Black Diamond Impulse 104 Ski. This ski offers quick edge to edge control, ample float for fresh snow, and a bombproof construction that we can trust every time out.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Impulse 98 Ti Skis - 2025
Product.Long_Description: Whatever lays under them, Black Diamond's Impulse 98 Ti Skis can ride it. The mid-fat waist can float on soft snow and find an edge on hardpack, while the sintered base glides effortlessly across flats. Equipped with a full sheet of Titanal, this ski quiets the chatter and drives serious power to the edge for unstoppable confidence at speed.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Impulse 98 Ti Skis - 2025 - Women's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"The Impulse 98 Ti is my go-to ski for all-mountain versatility. The Titanal sheet adds incredible stability on fast, choppy runs, and the poplar core gives it the perfect balance of power and flex. Whether I'm ripping through soft snow or navigating steep technical lines, these skis feel smooth, damp, and confident underfoot."For skiers who demand high-speed precision and all-mountain versatility, the Black Diamond Impulse 98 Ti Skis deliver unmatched performance. With a 98mm waist, these skis offer stability and confidence on steep, chalky terrain while remaining nimble enough to navigate technical lines and softer snow conditions. Crafted in Austria, the Impulse features a pre-preg fiberglass layup and engineered poplar core, ensuring a smooth flex and torsional stiffness. Adding a layer of Titanal boosts edge hold, dampness, and stability at high speeds, while elastomeric materials absorb vibrations for a smoother ride. Flat-top construction with full ABS sidewalls enhances power and durability, making this ski a go-to for aggressive downhill performance. With a versatile rocker profile and women's-specific lengths, the Impulse 98 Ti is a trusted companion for everything from technical runs to wide-open bowls.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Impulse 98 Ski - 2024
Product.Long_Description: When Black Diamond says the Impulse 98 Ski is all-mountain, they really mean the whole mountain-both in-bounds and out. It's a versatile all-mountain ski that rides the backcountry as well as the resort. The shape is equally versatile with a solid ability to perform in soft snow as well as firm. We like how stiff the ski feels, and although it's slightly heavier than Black Diamond's more backcountry-oriented skis, the Impulse is still light enough to tour around comfortably. There's even a tail clip for skins on the back, because Black Diamond knows you'll want to ride these skis regardless of the side of the rope.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond HiLight Tent: 3-Person 4-Season
Product.Long_Description: Black Diamond designed the HiLight Tent with base camps, winter mountaineering, and anchoring in on steep pitches in mind. It's a lightweight, 4-season tent that's easy to hike in when the trail to the alpine is long and arduous. The 30D polyester fabric is light and easy to pack, and the two-and-a-half pole design keeps the fabric tight in all weather. Fully sealed seams prevent raindrops or snowflakes from seeping through, and Flow Manifold lets interior heat convection and exterior airflow to draw moisture vapor and stale air out of the tent. Two full-size doors with mesh windows amplify airflow for even better ventilation on summer trips.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Recon Pro Stretch Bib Pant - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Whether we're on a backcountry mission or whipping up powder on the hill, the Black Diamond Recon Pro Stretch Bib Pant moves with us effortlessly and encourages exploration. Bootpacking or skinning to untouched runs is a breeze thanks to the stretchy face fabric and the completely waterproof, highly breathable construction.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Recon Stretch Pro Shell - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The Recon Pro Stretch Shell keeps us dry and sheltered from the elements when we're in-bounds or putting down fresh skin racks in the backcountry. Its 4-way stretch holds up against wind, moisture, and time, acting as our first defense.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Recon Stretch Bib Pant - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Whether we're earning your turns or lapping lifts, the Recon Stretch Bib Ski Pant from Black Diamond keeps us comfortable, moving, and dry. Its BD. dry waterproof membrane offers protection on stormy days while also providing breathability on long tours in the backcountry. An updated, low-profile beacon pocket stows avy gear when we venture out of bounds, and thigh pockets store daily necessities. Offset side venting dumps heat when we're boot-packing and lapping turns in deep powder, while the high-mounted snow gaiter keeps out those fresh flakes for day-long comfort in the snow.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Recon Stretch Ski Shell Jacket - Women's
Product.Long_Description: For missions through the resort or into the backcountry, the Black Diamond Recon Stretch Ski Shell Jacket is briefed and ready for action. It's built with a BD. dry membrane that seals out snow while allowing air to flow, and it has underarm vents for extra breathability when we need it. Four-way stretch construction encourages our full range of motion, while the adjustable hood and cuffs customize the fit.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Recon Stretch Ski Shell - Men's
Product.Long_Description: It's darn near impossible for ski companies to incorporate stretchy material into a ski shell that actually fends off winter's weather, but Black Diamond's Recon Stretch Ski Shell seems to keep snow out while we ride through the backcountry's deep powder. Unlike most ski jackets, the Recon Stretch incorporates four-way stretch fabric into a waterproof, breathable membrane that shields you from snow whether you're skinning through snowfall or skiing through face shots. We love that there are ventilation zippers under each arm in case you get too warm, and a helmet-compatible hood and removable powder skirt to keep you covered in case you get too cold or wet.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Recon Stretch Bib Pant - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Black Diamond Women's Recon Stretch Bib Pant is fully covered in hightly-rated waterproof, breathable protection to protect in powdery weather whether you're touring the backcountry or riding the resort. Its BD. Dry 3L membrane is light, thin, and remarkably breathable to perform well on the skin track. Black Diamond designed the bib with stretchy fabric to offer freedom of movement up and down the mountain. There are adjustments at the waist and suspenders for solid coverage, and snow gaiters keep pow out of your boots.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Recon Insulated Pant - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Whether we are riding in bounds or out, the Black Diamond Recon Insulated Pant is a must-have for chilly winter days. Built with a 2-layer BD. dry waterproof and breathable membrane, the Recon Insulated Pant has us covered in the deepest of powder. The four-way stretch face fabric allows us to maintain superior mobility when carving through the trees, and Thermolite zoned insulation gives us strategically-placed insulation for the best combination of warmth, breathability, and freedom of movement. The cuffs have a quarter-length zipper for easy boot access, and reinforced instep patches protect the pants from rocks and ski edges. The articulated knees and seat give us a proper fit when shredding down the mountain, and the gusseted construction allows for optimal freedom of movement. Finally, offset side thigh zippers allow us to increase our airflow and let off excess heat when we get too hot, while the high-mounted snow gaiters ensure the snow stays out of our pants.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Highline Stretch Shell - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The Black Diamond HighLine Stretch Shell is the type of layer that has a place in our pack every time we head for higher elevations, perfect for windy early morning starts and stormy afternoon descents. The BD. dry membrane is exceptionally waterproof and breathable, keeping us comfortable while we tote a heavy pack up steep mountains and deflecting snow and wind as we work our way up the skin track. The stretch fabric gives us our full, natural range of motion, and since it packs down small, we can keep it in our pack and be ready for anything the mountains throw at us.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Recon Stretch Ski Pant - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Whether we're earning our turns or lapping lifts, the Recon Stretch Ski Pant from Black Diamond keeps us moving freely in dry comfort. Its BD. dry waterproof membrane offers protection on stormy days while also providing breathability when we're on long tours in the backcountry. We appreciate that the four-way stretch fabric keeps you moving on the skin track and mobile through tree runs. An updated, low profile PIEPS Pocket stows your avy gear when you venture out of bounds, and thigh pockets store your daily necessities. Offset side venting dumps heat when you're boot-packing and lapping turns in deep powder, while the high-mounted snow gaiter keeps out those fresh flakes for day-long comfort in the snow.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Recon Stretch Ski Pant - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Whether your mission's objective is to lap the tram as many times as possible or to be descending before sunrise so you can get to work on time, the Black Diamond Recon Stretch Ski Pants want to come along. Their waterproof, breathable BD. dry membrane seals out snow and rain without trapping in vapor to keep you comfortable whether you're doing laps at the resort or hiking for your turns. Four-way stretch construction works with the articulated seat and knees to ensure that you can move without restriction and hold a natural stance without the discomfort of bunching fabric. Offset vents and 1/4-zip leg zippers ensure that you can vent heat when you need to and that you can easily access your boots without a hassle. Reinforced kick patches help the pants stand up to interactions with ski edges and crampons, extending their expected lifespan even if you're clumsy on dawn patrols.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Recon LT Stretch Shell - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The Black Diamond Recon Stretch Ski Shell features 4-way stretch shell for performance and comfort on the slopes. It's waterproof and windproof to keep us from getting chilly while it's also breathable and includes underarm zip vents to dump heat and moisture when we're skinning or skiing hard.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Dawn Patrol Hybrid Shell Jacket - Women's
Product.Long_Description: If you haven't already guessed by its name, the Dawn Patrol Hybrid Shell Jacket loves fresh snow, early morning starts, and breaking trail. Designed to keep you comfortable on the skintrack as well as the way down, it features a unique hybrid construction. Highly breathable 4-stretch softshell is placed beneath the arms, while the chest, shoulders, and hood remain impenetrable to snow. So while you wouldn't want to be jumping into any lakes expecting to stay dry, it's more than ample protection for that fluffy white stuff-and we think a little extra internal comfort on the ascent more than makes up for this.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Dawn Patrol Hybrid Shell Jacket - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The Dawn Patrol Hybrid Shell is Black Diamond's backcountry-specific ski jacket that feels equally comfortable on the uphill as it does on the downhill, especially when it's powdery out there. Its BD. dry membrane is extremely waterproof, breathable, and even windproof. Black Diamond also added GTT's Empel Breathable Water Protection Technology, which is a water- and PFC-free DWR that's more durable and performs better than the competition. Softshell paneling provides extra breathable and a four-way stretch in key areas to keep comfy on the skin track.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Recon LT Stretch Pant - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Whether you're sending it in the backcountry or hitting laps at the resort, the Black Diamond Recon LT Stretch Pant is built to keep you dry and warm for a full day on the slopes. Its BD. dry 4-way stretch shell is not only waterproof but also extremely breathable, ensuring optimal comfort with minimal moisture buildup in between runs. A built-in ladder lock waist adjustment system keeps your pants securely in place while an included back loop offers an easy powder skirt to pant attachment, minimizing the chance of snow getting inside.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Dawn Patrol Hybrid Pant - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Women's Dawn Patrol Hybrid Pant is Black Diamond's backcountry-specific ski pant that balances comfort on the uphill with a solid downhill performance. Its BD. dry membrane is extremely waterproof, breathable, and even windproof. Black Diamond also added GTT's Empel Breathable Water Protection Technology, which is a water- and PFC-free DWR that's more durable and performs better than the competition. Softshell paneling provides extra breathable and a four-way stretch in key areas to keep comfy on the skin track.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Dawn Patrol Hybrid Pant - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The Dawn Patrol Hybrid Pant is Black Diamond's backcountry-specific ski pant that balances comfort on the uphill with a solid downhill performance. Its BD. dry membrane is extremely waterproof, breathable, and even windproof. Black Diamond also added GTT's Empel Breathable Water Protection Technology, which is a water- and PFC-free DWR that's more durable and performs better than the competition. Softshell paneling provides extra breathable and a four-way stretch in key areas to keep comfy on the skin track.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Helio Fixed Length Carbon Ski Poles
Product.Long_Description: Black Diamond isn't going to pair its brand-new touring and mountaineering ski collection with any old pole. New for this year, the Helio Fixed Length Carbon Ski Poles are just as lightweight and stiff as their namesake. An innovative inflation molding device makes these poles the lightest that Black Diamond has ever made. BD integrated an extended grip directly into the pole that helps you choke down on steeper ascents. Another new innovative to the Helio is a stiffened basket that has a hooking point for switching heel risers faster.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Highline Stretch Pant - Women's
Product.Long_Description: If you are looking for a versatile alpine pant, your search ends with the Black Diamond Highline Stretch Pant. This pant is built with durable nylon, BD. dry technology, and treated with PFC-free DWR to keep your lower body protected from the elements. When the weather heats up, 3/4-length side zips offer superior ventilation to keep you moving comfortably.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Highline Stretch Pant - Men's
Product.Long_Description: When snagging summits in the wintertime, we pull on the Black Diamond Highline Stretch Pant. The featherweight construction feels ultralight and breezy yet mutes icy gusts and shuts out spindrift, shielding us from cruel conditions without restricting our movement or suffocating our microclimate. When the terrain gets icy, we strap into our crampons and trek on in confidence, knowing the rugged kick patches and cinched leg openings won't get ripped up or caught up on the spikes.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Element Hooded Jacket - Men's
Product.Long_Description: When we first got the Black Diamond Element Hooded Jacket we never thought we would use it as much as we have. This water-resistant jacket thrives at the crag when it is chilly, performs well during warmer backcountry tours, and can even work as a midlayer under our favorite shell for resort days.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Dawn Patrol Pant - Women's
Product.Long_Description: When it comes to travelling efficiently on all-day tours, look no further than the Black Diamond Women's Dawn Patrol Pant to assure unimpeded mobility and hard-wearing protection. This pant features a four-way stretch nylon construction that's equal parts durable, pliable, and breathable so you can high-step and lunge till the cows come home-or in the very least until Ullr sends more snow. Additionally, the DWR treatment fends off light precipitation and moisture, while the Keprotec instep patches double down on protection against sharp crampons and ski edges. Internal snow gaiters safeguard your footwear and baselayers, and the thigh pockets keep necessities close at hand. Not to mention, the offset, mesh-back vents provide on-the-go temperature regulation, meaning you never have to forgo protection in favor of dumping excess heat.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Distance Carbon Z Poles - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The adjustability of the W Distance Carbon Z Poles ensures we get the optimal height when racing in the mountains. Its super lightweight construction is balanced with a hearty carbon design that holds up for our gnarliest expeditions yet.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Distance 22L Backpack
Product.Long_Description: The Black Diamond Distance 22L Backpack sports a body-hugging fit and generous main compartment, balancing a nimble performance with plenty of storage space for our all-day alpine adventures. A vest-like fit moves smoothly with us during hikes, runs, or scrambles, while the custom-made UHMWPE construction holds up against rough rock and brush.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Distance 22L Backpack - Women's
Product.Long_Description: For unassisted ultras that take us into rugged alpine conditions, we stride out with the Black Diamond Distance 22L Backpack. The daypack capacity, Z-pole sleeves, and ice axe storage ensure we can carry all the fuel, layers, and tools we need to tackle harsh, varying conditions, while the vest-style suspension, dual sternum straps, and side compression minimize bounce and sway when picking up the pace or scrambling up near-vert sections. Plus, the women's-specific fit and stitch-free shoulder-strap edges promise a snug, low-bulk, and low-friction fit.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Vapor Carbon 2 Ski Poles
Product.Long_Description: When we are touring we prioritize performance over all else, second to performance is weight savings, so we make sure to use the Black Diamond Vapor Carbon 2 Ski Poles. These two-piece poles adjust to whatever length we want while keeping our arms fresh for yet another lap.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Dawn Patrol 32L Backpack
Product.Long_Description: Whether we're up at the crack of dawn for a pre-work sunrise skin or spending our weekend hunting powder, the Black Diamond Dawn Patrol 32L Backpack has our back for our backcountry adventures. The 32-liter capacity carries plenty of gear and layers with external attachment points for our skis/snowboard, ice axes, and helmet. We also like the insulated pocket for our reservoir to keep icy crosswinds from freezing up our water supply.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Shadow Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: With its sharp asymmetry and deep downturn, the Shadow Climbing Shoe is undoubtedly the most aggressive option in Black Diamond's exciting lineup of footwear for the vertical world. Instead of vertical, however, the Shadow shines on overhung boulders and routes. The NeoFriction Fuse rubber sole has a sensitive, sticky nature so we can feel micro-edges on our toe, and instead of making the sole out of several cut strips of rubber, Black Diamond molded the rubber directly onto the upper to reduce peeling and increase longevity. Equally unique, the upper features a soft, breathable knit microfibers with rubber strips for effective toe-hooking.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Distance Carbon Z Poles - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Whether we're fastpacking or ultrarunning, Black Diamond's Distance Carbon Z Poles support us on the ups and downs without weighting our arm swing. The slimmed down construction drops grams, not strength, to feel like air in our hands as we race across peaks, while the foldable design tucks away neatly on the straightaways.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Shadow LV Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: The Shadow is Black Diamond's most aggressive climbing shoe for steep sport routes and hard bouldering, and the Shadow LV Climbing Shoe has a lower volume to accommodate narrower feet more comfortably. Its rubber sole is printed and molded to the upper-instead of cut to fit into shape-for longer lasting durability that prevents peeling overtime. The rubber extends nearly over the entire stretch-resistant upper for effective toe hooking. Everything that isn't rubber is Black Diamond's Engineered Knit Technology for enhanced breathability. The soft midsole helps you feel the sharpest jibs on microscopic footholds.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Coefficient Fleece Hooded Jacket - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Coefficient Fleece Hooded Jacket is our go-to midlayer for everything cold and quick-paced. Its soft, breathable fleece material is quick-drying for high-output activities, while the zippered chest pocket stashes our keys or phone securely. td {border: 1px solid #cccccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;}

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond CoEfficient Fleece Hooded Jacket - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Simple and versatile, the CoEfficient Fleece Hooded Jacket works as a midlayer or on its own whether you're earning turns in the backcountry, cranking on some ice walls, or headed down south for some cold-weather rock climbing. The CoEfficient's Polartec Power Dry High Efficiency fabric is incredibly breathable to keep you comfortable while you pull in the vertical world or break trail up steep slopes. The fleece construction also gives the jacket fast dry times to pull moisture off your body before it turns to sweat, leaving you dry and happy wherever you are. The hood slides under a climbing helmet for added warmth on windy belays, and the lined neck with brushed microsuede delivers comfort you'll appreciate on the wall and out in the backcountry. Integrated thumb loops provide added coverage to limit skin exposure on exposed ridge-top transitions and offer protection against icey ski edges.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Coefficient LT Hybrid Hoodie - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Rather than letting cold weather support a sedentary life, we pick the perfect layers-like the Black Diamond Coefficient LT Hybrid Hoodie-to keep moving all winter long. This lightweight layer is ideal for alpine adventures, thanks to the added layer of Primaloft insulation keeping heat close. Meanwhile, the Polartec fleece aids breathability and moisture-wicking, enhancing warmth without letting us overheat while active.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Deploy Wind Shell Jacket - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Black Diamond designed the Men's Deploy Wind Shell Jacket to be the lightest shell around for emergency wind protection while climbing or trekking in the alpine. Its exclusive fabric is a remarkable 5 denier ripstop from Japan, and it features the world's first YKK Super Lightweight zipper for a total weight of around an ounce and a half. Black Diamond treated the Deploy with DWR for durable weather resistance. The jacket packs into its own pocket to fit in chalk bags and other pockets.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Distance 15L Backpack - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Made for fast and light mountain missions, Black Diamond's Distance 15 Backpack is a hybrid pack that combines an alpine-worthy daypack with shoulder straps similar to running vests. We love that the shoulder harness utilizes Black Diamond's stitch-less Edge Taping Technology to eliminate chafing, while the ventilating back panel keeps our back cooler and our load close to body for scrambling and running technical ridgelines. Plus, external gear attachments and easily accessible stretch pockets keep our ice tools, trekking poles, devices, and snacks at hand.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Pursuit 30L Backpack - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The largest of Black Diamond's Pursuit packs, the Pursuit 30L Backpack provides enough storage for our all-day alpine missions without compromising a secure fit for nimble movement. Dual sternum straps and a winged waist belt create a body-hugging fit that moves with us during fast hikes or scrambles, while ample harness pockets keep hydration flasks or snacks at hand.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Distance 15L Backpack
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"I use the Distance 15 when I need something that moves like a running vest but still carries tools for alpine missions. It hugs the body with zero bounce, has room for layering pieces and traction, and the pole storage is super intuitive. It's become my go-to for everything from long ridge traverses to speedy peak days."The Distance 15 Backpack is built for days when the line between running and scrambling disappears. Designed with the mountains in mind, this hybrid pack lets us move light and fast-whether we're chasing sunrises on the ridge or pushing for the summit before the afternoon storm rolls in. Black Diamond engineered this pack with a vest-style suspension system that keeps bounce to a minimum and essentials always within reach. Inside, the 15-liter capacity gives us just enough room for layers, nutrition, and a light alpine kit, while outside, we're loading up axes, poles, and water without breaking stride. The innovative Stitch-less Edge Taping Technology creates seamless comfort and freedom of movement, even with a full load. From the trailhead to exposed ridgelines, the Distance 15 proves that you don't have to sacrifice speed for gear.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Focus Climbing Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Sequential cruxes demand perfection. Your fingertips have to be perfectly aligned if they're going to grip the hold, in the same way that the Black Diamond Women's Focus Climbing Shoe's rubber needs to be perfectly aligned along the microscopic edge if you want to stay standing. Black Diamond designed this aggressive shoe for this kind of perfect precision, with a slight downturn that edges and grips on vertical to gently-overhung problems and routes. Medial and lateral stabilizer rands keep your foot solid when you're edging, and the single-molded NeoFriction rubber sole won't peel away in the same way that standard climbing shoes do. Black Diamond coupled the leather upper with a odor-reducing hemp liner and a knit tongue for amplified ventilation.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Aspect Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: Given that Black Diamond's Salt Lake City warehouse is five hours away from Indian Creek and a few miles from Little Cottonwood Canyon, it only makes sense for BD's footwear designers to come up with something like the Aspect Climbing Shoe-it even looks like the quartz monzonite that makes up Little Cottonwood. This shoe is simply meant to jam sandstone splitters and stand on slabby granite. BD meticulously chose the upper's leather from the finest European tanneries to ensure a plush feek in between a rock and another rock, and the leather wraps around the laces and breathable, knit tongue to reduce pinching while jamming. The stiff sole is composed of a uniquely molded NeoFriction Edge rubber that is long-lasting and reliably sticky for Yosemite's test-piece slab routes littered all over Little Cottonwood Canyon.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Compactor Ski Poles
Product.Long_Description: While you're all about earning your turns, you're not too keen on tacking on more weight than necessary. So when it comes time to get elevated, reach for the Black Diamond Compactor Ski Pole and trek onward-lightly. With a little help from a quick-release button, the pole folds down into three compact pieces that stay connected with a flexible yet tenacious cord (Black Diamond calls this technology Z-Pole), which also makes it easy to stow when it's not in use. A FlickLock Pro mechanism allows you to adjust the length easily, and the Compactor boasts reinforcements at the joints. And thanks to its simple and effective design, you can save your battles for the terrain at hand and focus on getting to the fun part.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond AirNet Harness - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The AirNet Harness is Black Diamond's lightest, most breathable harness designed specifically for competition climbing. Its AirNet construction combines an abrasion-resistant shell with a soft, breathable, quick-drying lining, and Black Diamond's slim Dynex slings weave in between the two for load-balancing support and reliable durability. Everything else about this harness was designed to be as minimal and light as possible. There are rigid gear loops to the sides for quickly grabbing draws, and the webbing gear loops hold your belay devices and specs. BD's small logo at the back doubles as a chalk bag hanger.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond AirNet Harness - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The AirNet Harness is Black Diamond's lightest, most breathable harness designed specifically for competition climbing. Its AirNet construction combines an abrasion-resistant shell with a soft, breathable, quick-drying lining, and Black Diamond's slim Dynex slings weave in between the two for load-balancing support and reliable durability. Everything else about this harness was designed to be as minimal and light as possible. There are rigid gear loops to the sides for quickly grabbing draws, and the webbing gear loops hold your belay devices and specs. BD's small logo at the back doubles as a chalk bag hanger.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Stormline Stretch Anorak - Women's
Product.Long_Description: We love that the Black Diamond Stormline Stretch Anorak conveniently packs into a mesh stow pouch inside its own kangaroo pocket, making it easy to throw in our pack for on-the-go trail protection. The wind- and waterproof membrane is reinforced with a moisture-shedding fabric and waterproof front zipper, keeping us dry and comfy from all angles.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Stormline Stretch Anorak - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The Stormline Stretch Anorak conveniently packs into a mesh stow pouch inside its own kangaroo pocket, making it easy to throw in our hiking or climbing pack for on-the-go protection. The wind- and waterproof membrane is reinforced with a moisture-shedding fabric and waterproof front zipper, keeping us dry and comfy from all angles.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Technician Pro Alpine Pant - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Ultralight yet highly technical, the Black Diamond Technician Pro Alpine Pant joins us on every big wall pursuit. The tough material holds strong against sharp rock, while the woven-in stretch, articulated knees, and gusseted crotch keep us feeling free as we twist, stem, and jam our way up the face. Our harness cinches comfortably over this pair's low-profile ladder-lock waist, and the deep-access hand pockets remain accessible to stash our tape and lip balm. With quick-dry prowess and a breathable feel, the performance fibers keep us feeling good and the Graphene yarn helps hold in warmth as we settle in our hanging cot for the night.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Mission XP Leather Approach Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: When the trek in is just as challenging as the routes we plan to climb, we lace up the Black Diamond Mission XP Leather Approach shoe and set off toward the crag under our gear-loaded packs. The durable suede uppers are protected by TPU overlays that shield our feet from rough rock and low brambles, so we can follow hidden side trails to the best rock on the rock face, and the moisture-wicking lining keeps us cool on sweltering afternoon hikes back to the car. The plush dual-density EVA midsole is supported by a forefoot shank that increases forefoot protection and offers precise edging while climbing through boulder fields, and the BlackLabel-Mountain soles are exceptionally sticky, so we can move confidently over technical terrain.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Distance 8L Backpack - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Designed for nimble hikes, runs, and scrambles, the Distance 8L Backpack features a vest-like harness to deliver a body-hugging fit while we tackle the terrain ahead. Shoulder strap pockets keeps hydration flasks and gels at hand, while the compressible main compartment stashes extra gear needed for the day.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Helio Binding Brake Kit - 2023
Product.Long_Description: Add some stopping power to your Black Diamond Helio with this convenient brake kit. This newly designed rear brake pairs with your Helio bindings and crampon hook to prevent ski-sliding disasters while you tour.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Stormline Stretch Full Zip Rain Pant - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The Black Diamond Stormline Stretch Pant prepares us for rainy treks through wooded forests and huge mountain ranges for days at a time. It has plenty of protection from driving rain and howling winds, and thanks to the breathable membrane and full-length double-separating side zips, we're able to regulate our temperature to avoid overheating.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Camalot Ultralight
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying: "I shaved serious weight off my rack with the Camalot Ultralights. For long alpine routes or fast-and-light missions, every gram counts. These offer the same confidence-inspiring lobes and ranges as the standard C4s, but ditch the extra heft. They're bomber, easy to place, and they're a game-changer on the sharp end."When we're heading deep into the backcountry or eyeing a long alpine route, we need every ounce of weight savings we can get without sacrificing performance. Black Diamond's Camalot Ultralight gives us that perfect balance. These cams retain the trusted double-axle design and color-coded slings of the classic C4s, but drop nearly 25% of the weight thanks to the use of Dyneema slings and sculpted lobes. That translates to faster movement on route, easier packing, and less pump at the crux. Whether we're climbing in the Bugaboos or linking pitches in the Wind Rivers, we rely on these cams for their consistent placement, smooth handling, and reliable hold. Their unique cable-stem construction is flexible yet sturdy, making them ideal for tricky placements or wandering lines. When we're moving light and fast, Ultralights are the cams we reach for first.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Pursuit 15L Backpack
Product.Long_Description: Made for active days in the mountains, the Pursuit 15L Backpack stashes the items we need to push towards the summit. Black Diamond's BD Continuous Fit Harness features a winged waist belt that hugs our body for stable movement during hikes and scrambles, while ample harness pocket storage keeps hydration flasks or snacks at hand.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Dawn Patrol 15L Backpack
Product.Long_Description: The Black Diamond Dawn Patrol 15L Backpack is the perfect-sized pack for sneaking in quick laps before work or school. The 15-liter capacity has just enough room for the essentials with external attachment points to help us carry our skis, snowboard, helmet, and piolet.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Distance Wind Shell - Women's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"I always pack the Distance Wind Shell for trail runs and alpine climbs. It weighs next to nothing and provides excellent wind resistance when the weather turns. Plus, it packs into its own pocket, making it easy to stash in my pack or even a pocket."We understand the importance of lightweight protection during high-intensity mountain activities, and the Black Diamond Distance Wind Shell delivers just that. Crafted from 15D nylon ripstop with a PFC-free DWR treatment, this ultralight jacket offers wind resistance and light moisture protection without weighing us down. Its athletic fit and hip-length design ensure freedom of movement, while the fixed, helmet-compatible hood adds versatility for climbing and alpine adventures. When the wind calms, the jacket conveniently packs into its own chest pocket, making it an essential piece for any fast-paced mountain endeavor.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Treeline Rain Shell Jacket - Men's
Product.Long_Description: When dark clouds threaten our hike we make sure to bring along our Black Diamond Treeline Rain Shell Jacket. This jacket balances weight savings and waterproofing to keep us prepared for inclement weather wherever we happen to be.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Mission LT Approach Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Out of Black Diamond's new collection of approach shoes, the Mission LT is a lightweight, technical hiker designed for fast-and-light missions on technical terrain. Its rockered-esque profile tackles steep sandstone and scree fields like a powder ski in soft snow. The BlackLabel sole's rubber is fine-tuned for traction on mountainous terrain, and a plethora of rock-protective features keep your foot ready for the climb after tenuous trails. Black Diamond's engineered EnduroKnit upper is remarkably durable and comfortably breathable in warmer weather.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Treeline Rain Shell - Women's
Product.Long_Description: With the Treeline Rain Shell clipped to our pack, we're ready for nature's surprise tantrums. When the first fat raindrop splats our cheek and the wind starts to howl, we quickly shrug into the watertight jacket and cinch the hood tight just as the sky dumps. The pack-friendly hand pockets keep our snacks and topo dry, while the adventure-ready design moves with us as we push onward through the sideways torrent.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Stormline Stretch Rain Pant - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Black Diamond built the StormLine Stretch Rain Pants to help you push your limits even when the weather disagrees, so you'll feel confident and secure when clouds start to form above the timberline. A stretch face fabric with DWR finish repels wind, rain, and snow as you work your way up past the treeline and into the deluge. As the terrain becomes more rugged, a gusseted seat and articulated knees increase mobility. When the storm passes and the summit comes back into view, simply stow the pants into the zippered back pocket and start your final push for the summit.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Coefficient LT 1/4-Zip Pullover - Women's
Product.Long_Description: From alpine walls to shoulder-season treks, the Black Diamond Coefficient LT 1/4-Zip Pullover gives us that touch of warmth we need to fend off the chill without overheating. The stretch polyester fabric lets our skin breathe and our shoulders move freely, while the flatlock seams ensure chafe doesn't slow us down.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Solution 150 Merino Base Crew - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The Black Diamond Men's Solution 150 Merino Base Crew is a lightweight baselayer built for backcountry touring, rock climbing, and cold camping trips. Its merino wool blended Nuyarn fabric is exclusive to Black Diamond and excels at thermal regulation, odor control, and long-lasting durability. There are thumbholes to secure the sleeves under ski gloves, and the slim fit works with flatlock seams to layer well whether it's a ski shell, midlayer, or light alpine shell.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Alpine Light Pant - Women's
Product.Long_Description: From backpacking to long days spent out at the crag, the Black Diamond Alpine Light Pant is our go-to. Featuring a four-way stretch nylon fabric, the Alpine Light Pant is durable, super comfortable, and moves with us. A PFC-free DWR coating sheds off moisture from the exterior of the pants, and the articulated knees and gusseted crotch ensure we have a total range of motion. The waistband is made with a stretchy knit fabric for comfort and has an integrated adjustable belt for the perfect fit. To top it off, two front drop-in pockets, one rear, and a zippered thigh pocket store our daily snacks and essentials.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Alpine Light Pant - Men's
Product.Long_Description: When we embark on a mission to a wind-washed ridge, we trust the Black Diamond Alpine Light Pant. From hiking to climbing, the 4-way stretch fabric and feature-packed design of these pants keep us moving comfortably and searching for more.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Session Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Session Shoe is the most casual approach shoe from Black Diamond, designed for climbers commuting from climbing gyms to crags, and maybe stopping at a cafe along the way. Black Diamond's engineered knit upper feels both breathable and durable to keep comfy on warm trails, and the elastic heel maintains a snug fit that you can collapse to wear as a slip-on in between redpoint attempts. The lining is a sock-like bootie built to accommodate socks, or not. Underfoot, Black Diamond's BlackLabel rubber gives street-styled stickiness, and EVA cushions on trails and sidewalks alike.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Alpenglow Pro Hooded Top - Women's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying: "This is my go-to for high-alpine approaches and sunny ridge scrambles. The fabric feels cool even under a pack, and the hood stays put in the wind. I especially love the high collar and built-in thumbholes-they keep me covered without feeling bulky."We chase long objectives under big skies, and the Black Diamond Alpenglow Pro Hooded Top is made for exactly that. Built with BD. cool mineral-based tech, this sun hoody reflects heat and keeps us cool when we're moving under intense solar exposure. The UPF 50+ protection gives us full-coverage confidence for full days outside. The quarter-zip design lets us vent on the climb, and the stretch-woven panels add mobility where we need it most. The fitted hood layers comfortably under a helmet, while thumbholes and a drop-tail hem keep everything in place when we're on the move. For alpine starts, mid-day scrambles, or desert climbs, the Alpenglow Pro is always in our pack.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Forged Jean - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The Men's Forged Denim Pant is most certainly sleek and stylish enough to wear around town, but Black Diamond optimized it for climbs ranging from V11 boulders to Yosemite's big walls. It's made of a special Cordura Stretch Denim fabric that's extremely durable against the rock and remarkably light and stretchy for performance-oriented comfort. Despite its stylish slim fit, the Forged Denim has a slight taper to promote freedom of movement. The button and belt loops are all designed with a lower profile to accommodate harnesses more comfortably, and the brush pocket is located next to one of the back pockets.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Forged Jean - Women's
Product.Long_Description: We pull on Black Diamond's Forged Jean and take it to the rock where it thrives. The V11 Fit sits close, keeping our view to our toes clear while still having give to let us stem and drop knee freely. The three-piece, anti-slack waistband won't stretch out even after multiple days on the wall.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Traverse Ski Poles
Product.Long_Description: Black Diamond's versatile Traverse Ski Poles are the trusty workhorses of backcountry ski touring. We like the bombproof construction, reliable feel, and peace of mind that these poles provide both uphill and downhill.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Notion SP Pant - Women's
Product.Long_Description: We make our back-flags seamless with the Black Diamond Notion SP Pant-an organic cotton pant with just enough stretch for bouldering and sport climbing. On more technical climbs, the elastic cuffs keep pant legs secure around the ankle to hone in on knobby granite footholds and reinforced knees protect your skin from cheese-grater rock on less-than-graceful sequences. Once you've reached the chains and lowered, the comfort on the wall is matched on the ground-the Notion SP will make you feel like you're lounging in sweatpants between burns.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Credo Pant - Women's
Product.Long_Description: If the rock is sharp but jeans don't provide the mobility you need for the redpoint, the Black Diamond Credo Women's Pant has you covered. It's lightweight and stretchy but remarkably durable, so those stylin' kneebars and tight squeezes don't shred your skin, and it sports a fit that looks good at the post-crag brag session when you're telling everyone how that 5. 13 crux wasn't actually all that cruxy.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Notion SP Pant - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Built with organic cotton and a splash of elastane, the Black Diamond Notion SP Pant offers just enough stretch to keep up with our bouldering and sport climbing moves. On more technical climbs, the elastic cuffs keep pant legs secure around the ankle to hone in on knobby granite footholds, and reinforced knees protect our skin from cheese-grater rock on less-than-graceful sequences.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Mantle Pant - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Whether our work gets done at the crag or in an office, the Black Diamond Mantle Pant is built to handle the rigors of daily life. The tough cotton canvas construction features a slight amount of stretch that allows us to get our legs up on high kicks and move smoothly from hold to hold across our latest bouldering project. The articulated knees and gusseted crotch ensure we have plenty of room to move, so whether we're pushing paperwork or pulling on the bottom of a jug, we'll be comfortable all day.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Vision Helmet
Product.Long_Description: The Vision has seen granite pillars, blue glaciers, and sandstone offwidths while strapped to our head. The hard shell prevents ice crumbles and small choss from leaving dents and dings behind, while the revamped sides and back give us increased coverage as we chase the send.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Alpenglow Hooded Long-Sleeve Shirt - Women's
Product.Long_Description: We wear the Alpenglow Hoodie for long approaches, crashpad naps, and full days of climbing in the sun. Designed to keep you cool while preventing another sunburn, this top features BD. cool technology, which reflects external heat, while the added UPF protection shields you from harmful rays as you climb pitch after pitch.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Distance 5in Short - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Working with their athletes, Black Diamond developed the Distance 5in Short for those ultralong trail runs. The high-stretch material, split-leg design, and elastic waist give us a range of motion limited only by our own mobility, while the interior brief delivers the quick-drying support we need when going fast and far.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Notion Pant - Women's
Product.Long_Description: From pebble wrestling to hammock napping, the Black Diamond Notion Pant keeps us moving freely and our skin breathing easy. The organic cotton brings durability and airflow at a lower environmental cost, while the stretch and crotch gusset let us mantel and lounge unrestricted. Plus, equipped with reinforced knees, this pair lets us take full advantage of every kneebar rest we can find.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Notion Pant - Men's
Product.Long_Description: From evenings after work in the gym to balmy days at the crag, we trust the Black Diamond Notion Pant. Breezy cotton with a little stretch keeps us cool, calm, and collected as we work on a problem, while the elastic waist and ankle lock in a secure fit.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Notion Pant - Women's
Product.Long_Description: From getting to work in the gym to weekend-long trips out at our secret climbing spot, the Black Diamond Notion Pants are with us every step and belay along the way. Featuring a stretchy organic cotton and elastane blend, the Notion Pant is super comfortable and moves with us when climbing. The elastic waistband allows us to get the perfect fit every time, and the elastic cuffs and articulated legs ensure we can move freely. Lastly, two hand pockets, a rear pocket, and a side zippered pocket store all our essentials and snacks for a day of climbing.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Notion Pant - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Black Diamond designed the Men's Notion Pant for training in climbing gyms and testing new-found strengths at the crag. Its stretch organic cotton twill feels durable against the rock, breathable to keep comfy on the climb, and soft enough for relaxing on crash pads. Black Diamond reinforced the knees to prolong abrasion-resistance against rough rock.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Distance 7in Short - Men's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"These shorts are a dream for mountain running. The five pockets give me room to carry gels, keys, and even my phone securely. The stretchy fabric with DWR finish is tough and dries quickly, so I can focus on the trail, no matter the conditions."The Distance 7in Short is crafted for long days on the trail, where durability, comfort, and functionality are key. Developed with insights from BD mountain athletes, these shorts feature a stretchy nylon-elastane blend with a PFC-free DWR finish that stands up to unpredictable weather and rugged terrain. Five utility pockets-including a secure zippered pocket for your phone-let us carry all the essentials without adding bulk. The updated quick-drying interior brief keeps us comfortable on steep climbs and long descents, while the reflective logos ensure visibility during early-morning or late-night adventures. Designed to perform and built to last, the Distance 7in Short is our go-to for trail running in the mountains.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Equipment For Alpinists Pullover Hoodie - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Black Diamond is committed to outfitting vertical enthusiasts-powder-hungry skiers, jamming trad dads, summit-snagging mountaineers, and all the awe-seeking adventurers in between-even in our time of planning, and their Equipment For Alpinists Pullover Hoodie is made for those days spent dreaming over maps, gear lists, and weather forecasts. The soft organic cotton fibers keep us cozy as the snow falls outside and reduces water and energy waste in production to keep our conscience feeling cozy too.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Dirtbag Short - Women's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying: "These are the shorts I live in all summer. They're comfy enough for lounging but built tough enough for climbing sessions. The wide waistband never digs under a harness, and the mix of twill and corduroy fabrics is super fun-I've ended up with more than one pair."When the temps rise and the climbing plans come together, we reach for the Black Diamond Dirtbag Shorts. Built for days at the crag and downtime at camp, they combine functional stretch with laid-back comfort in a silhouette that nods to classic vintage style. We love the wide elastic waistband and drawcord for a dialed-in fit, and the mix of available fabrics-stretch twill or corduroy-lets us choose our vibe. With roomy drop-in pockets and a mid-rise fit that pairs well with harnesses, these are the kind of shorts that move from route to rest day without missing a beat.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Black Diamond Dirtbag Short - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Whether we're sending bolted limestone or mantling sandstone boulders, we're in the Black Diamond Dirtbag Short. The tough build is both soft and stretchy for movement and resting comfort yet resists tearing and snagging against rock. Built with a low-profile elastic waist, this pair sits comfortably under our harness, and the internal drawcord lets us cinch in the fit while keeping the cord ends safely stored on the inside.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Flux Merino Shirt - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Flux Merino Shirt - Men's

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Sessions 9in Short - Women's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"These shorts are a must for any active day. The high-stretch fabric and quick-dry finish keep me comfortable on long hikes, and the wide, breathable waistband stays put even during scrambles."The Sessions Shorts 9in are our go-to for all-day adventures. Black Diamond combines lightweight, high-stretch Nylon Interlock Knit fabric with a quick-dry finish, ensuring these shorts move seamlessly with us on mountain trails or rugged ridgelines. The wide Powermesh-lined waistband offers breathable support, while the inner thigh gusset and high-rise fit deliver unrestricted motion and all-day comfort. Thoughtful details like the thigh and waistband stash pockets keep small essentials handy so we can focus on the trail ahead.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Notion SL Short - Women's
Product.Long_Description: For fun-packed summer weekends, we wear the versatile Notion SL Short. These techy shorts are stylish enough for brunch and tough enough for hikes and climbs. Stretch twill and a gusseted crotch offer impressive mobility whether we're confidently trekking or carefully scrambling.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Rhythm T-Shirt - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Don't throw off your groove-wear the Rhythm T-Shirt for reliable performance that never slows you down. Built with NuYarn fabric, this durable combination of nylon and wool wicks sweat during your most arduous treks, workouts, or trail runs, with a lightweight build to keep you comfortable at any pace.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Credo Short - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Fitting 13 pairs of shorts into your van isn't really feasible, but the Black Diamond Credo Women's Short takes up so little space that you can totally pack a couple pairs for your life on the road. The Credo's suitable for the crag and the cafe, too, so you can head straight from sending to chilling without having to worry about finding something less chalky.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Flatiron Short - Men's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"I've been wearing the Flatiron Short on everything from quick sunrise runs to fast-paced summit pushes. The stretch feels great and never limits my stride, and the DWR sheds light moisture without a hitch. It's light, comfortable, and tough enough for any terrain I've thrown at it."When we lace up for a quick lap before work or dial in pacing on a long weekend mountain run, the Black Diamond Flatiron Short keeps us moving with lightweight comfort and zero distractions. Built with stretch nylon and a PFC-free DWR finish, it's made to flex with every step while shedding light moisture and trail debris with ease. The elastic waistband and drawcord keep the fit secure through elevation gains and fast descents, while an inseam gusset boosts mobility for high steps and technical scrambles. A zippered rear pocket stashes gels, a phone, or even a compact headlamp, and reflective trim gives us some visibility when we're out past dusk. Whether we're chasing vert or just chasing daylight, the Flatiron Short moves with us.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Lightwire Long-Sleeve Tech T-Shirt - Women's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"This long sleeve is my go-to for climbing and trekking. The lightweight fabric keeps me cool, dries fast, and has an anti-odor finish perfect for multi-day trips. I also appreciate the mobility from the gusseted underarms."When we're tackling trails or climbing routes, the Lightwire Long Sleeve Tech Tee has our back. Crafted from recycled stretch polyester, this top offers breathable, quick-drying performance to keep us comfortable on any adventure. With raglan sleeves and underarm gussets, the Lightwire ensures mobility for active pursuits. Reflective logos add visibility for those dusk-to-dark outings.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Mantle Short - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The Black Diamond Mantle Short is made for our day-to-day life, tagging along everywhere from the crag to the office with comfort aplenty. A stretchy, durable organic cotton blend moves with us and resists the wear and tear of rock climbing, while a gusseted inseam really opens up our range of motion.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Rise Tight - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Send it on the rock wall in the Black Diamond Rise Tight, which gives us the flexibility to dyno towards the top in comfort. The high waist is made to cushion our harness as we climb, with a secure waistband that ensures no-slip coverage as we move. The four-way stretch fabric is moisture-wicking and breathable, with excellent durability to stand up to big falls and rough holds.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Lightwire Long-Sleeve Tech T-Shirt - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Everyone needs a long-sleeve technical tee-like the Black Diamond Lightwire Tech T-Shirt-to say comfortable when we're playing outside across three seasons. The polyester-stretch blend is moisture-wicking and quick-drying to keep us cooler in warm weather and warmer in cool weather. The fit isn't too tight or too bulky, and the raglan sleeves and underarm gussets keep us limber when we're climbing or hiking, trekking or training. That's the versatility we're looking for in our long-sleeve tech tees.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Solution Harness - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Black Diamond's Solution Harness is one of the most popular climbing harnesses in the vertical world for good reason. While there is lots to love we really like the fine tuned Fusion Comfort that provides us with incredible comfort and freedom when we're projecting a sport climb or belaying a friend who's taking their project bolt-to-bolt.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Solution Harness
Product.Long_Description: We like the Black Diamond Solution Harness's unrestricted movement while projecting our latest route obsession in the gym and at the crag. The Fusion Comfort Technology creates an interior webbing that evenly distributes pressure: no more wriggling away from pressure points while hanging off the wall to figure out beta.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Couloir LT Harness
Product.Long_Description: When we plan to kit up and stay kitted from the start, the Couloir LT is what we're reaching for. With one waist buckle and a single tie-in point, this harness keeps it ultra-light and streamlined, while the color-coded design simplifies and speeds finding upside and rightside.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Notion Short - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The Black Diamond Notion Short keeps us cool and comfortable on long, hot days at the local crag or late nights in the gym. The lightweight fabric is soft and airy, and the stretch fabric and gusseted seat give us a full range of motion so we can fluidly move across the wall. The drawcord waist allows us to secure a tight fit and easily fits beneath our harness so we can comfortably climb and belay for hours.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Sessions 5in Short - Women's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"These shorts are perfect for active days on the trail or in the gym. The breathable fabric and gusseted design allow total freedom of movement."The Sessions Shorts are built to keep us moving comfortably and confidently through every adventure. Crafted by Black Diamond, these all-mountain shorts feature a high-stretch nylon fabric with a quick-dry finish, ensuring lightweight breathability during high-output pursuits. A wide Powermesh-lined waistband provides a secure, breathable fit, while the inner thigh gusset and high-rise design enhance freedom of movement. Whether we're tackling a ridgeline scramble, heading out for a run, or enjoying a relaxed day outdoors, the Sessions Shorts effortlessly blend style, function, and comfort.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Talus Tank Top - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Built to handle bell-to-bell gym sessions, and then take that fitness to the crag on the weekends, the Talus Tank features a lightweight, breathable tech fabric that wicks moisture and keeps you dry when the moves heat up.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Notion Short - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Sending your first 5. 12 was awesome, but mowing down two large pepperoni pies as a way to celebrate maybe wasn't the best idea. While you lay down moaning in the shade and wait for the feeling to pass, give a little thanks for the mega-comfy Black Diamond Notion Men's Short, which is keeping you alive with its stretchy and light feel.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Splitter Tank Top - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Built for comfort at the crag or working out, Black Diamond's Splitter Tank offers total freedom of movement and more breathability than we know what to do with. Its open racerback design allows for total ventilation while you climb, while the fabric wicks away perspiration to keep you dry.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Sierra Short - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Sierra Shorts stretch and move with you through the crux and dry quick after the post send swim. Featuring a heavy denier for added durability for those who like to push their threads to the limit. A branded elastic waistband and zipper back pocket make these shorts comfy and perfect for adventures on and off the rock.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Sierra LT Short - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The Sierra LT Short from Black Diamond is a versatile short that's ready for climbing, hiking, and relaxing alike. With performance polyester and comfort-friendly features like an elasticated waist and gusseted inseam, we're prepared to enjoy every afternoon of fun in the sun.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Whippet Attachment
Product.Long_Description: Black Diamond's new Whippet Attachment works with any Whippet Ready ski pole to provide you with added security as you navigate through steep terrain or descend in no-fall zones. What's especially great about the attachment is that it provides you with the versatility to use it with your Whippet Ready ski pole on backcountry missions when you're navigating through technical terrain, but it can also be easily removed so you have a regular set of poles for all the days in between. The ClickLock mechanism makes it easy to add and remove from your pole, and the durable steel pick will reliably sink into firm snow if you need to self-arrest in an emergency.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Apollo Lantern
Product.Long_Description: From campgrounds to the alpine, any site is suitable for Black Diamond's Apollo Lantern. The QuadPower LED light provides a stunning 250 lumens of (at the max setting) output in a non-glaring case, while the fold-down legs let you elevate your illumination experience. Also, there's a power meter that indicates how much battery is left, and the adjustable dimming switch allows versatile brightness. So whatever mood you're in, you can make sure that the Apollo can adapt to it.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Momentum Harness - Women's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying: "This is my go-to harness for gym nights and weekend cragging. It's super easy to get a dialed fit, and I don't even notice it when I'm on the wall. It's comfy, breathable, and durable enough for all the top-roping and lead climbing I throw at it."Whether we're tying in at the gym or racking up at the crag, the Black Diamond Momentum Harness gives us dependable comfort and support. Designed with BD's signature Dual Core Construction, it balances weight and padding so we stay focused on the route-not pressure points. TrakFIT leg loops make sizing simple, even over layers, and four gear loops give us all the space we need for draws or cams. From first-time climbers to seasoned belay partners, the Momentum makes gearing up quick and getting after it easy.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Lightwire Tech Short-Sleeve T-Shirt - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Lightwire Tech Short-Sleeve T-Shirt goes with us from the gym to the trailhead, keeping us cool when we're trying hard and sending whatever project or goal we have in our mind.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Onsight 375 Headlamp
Product.Long_Description: When we go climbing we don't stop when the sun goes down, instead we reach for the Onsight 375 Headlamp. This headlamp boasts a low profile and a dual-beam configuration that lets you scale walls and solve problems after dark.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond HiLight Ground Cloth: 2-Person
Product.Long_Description: Fit the Black Diamond HiLight Ground Cloth under your HiLight tent to protect its floor when you pitch it on rough terrain. You don't always find a flat, rock-free campsite, so Black Diamond made this 10-ounce SilNylon ground cloth to protect your tent from rocks, sticks, and pinecones. The HiLight Ground Cloth also adds a layer of water resistance when you need to camp on snow.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Wool Eco Liner Beanie
Product.Long_Description: Designed to be worn under a helmet, this lightweight beanie utilizes recycled wool.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Venom Classic Pick
Product.Long_Description: The Black Diamond Venom Ice Pick is a classically curved replacement pick for your pre-2016 Venom Ice Axe. Providing secure placements in the ice and easy self arrests, this versatile pick is perfect for long, moderate alpine routes.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Heritage Wordmark Long-Sleeve T-Shirt - Men's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying: "The Heritage Wordmark Long-Sleeve is one of those pieces that you can wear just about anywhere. It's made from super soft, brushed back cotton fleece that feels great on the skin. The slightly oversized fit makes it extra comfortable, and the embroidered logo adds a subtle, classy touch. I like how it's built to last-it's the perfect go-to sweatshirt for cool-weather layering or just hanging out."When we're looking for comfort, simplicity, and style, the Black Diamond Heritage Wordmark Long-Sleeve T-Shirt is the perfect fit. Crafted from high-quality, organic brushed back cotton fleece, this long-sleeve tee feels luxuriously soft against the skin, making it a versatile piece that's ideal for layering on cool days or wearing solo when the weather is just right.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Sprint 225 Headlamp
Product.Long_Description: Specifically designed for running, the Sprint 225 Headlamp is one of the smallest lights in Black Diamond's collection. It fits in running shorts and vests without an issue, and it boasts a surprising 225 lumen brightness despite its small size. Instead of a flimsy button, the Sprint has Black Diamond's new PowerTap technology that adjusts brightness and turns the headlamp on and off. The headband is specifically designed for running to keep stable whether you're on streets or trails

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Vista Beanie
Product.Long_Description: Ears get cold, even when we're sending routes or bagging peaks, and the Vista Beanie is the perfect choice to keep us cozy. The design featuring endless peaks looks great at the crag, the peak, or the brewery, and the fleece-lined interior ensures we can enjoy the great outdoors all day long.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Faded Crop T-Shirt - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Black Diamond Faded Crop Tee is a versatile favorite for climbing and hiking enthusiasts-we can't wear performance 'fits every day. Made from 100% organic cotton, this heavy-weight jersey fabric provides the perfect blend of softness and durability for both active and laid-back days. We love the flattering cropped fit, which pairs effortlessly with high-waisted shorts or tights. Pre-shrunk for lasting size and shape, this tee is as functional as it is stylish, letting us feel comfortable and confident wherever the day takes us.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Washed Cap
Product.Long_Description: We consider a trusty cap to be somewhat of a necessity in life, and Black Diamond's Washed Cap is one of our favorites. A flat-brim design and retro style patch logo give this everyday hat a unique flair for your off-day outings.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Flat Bill Trucker Hat
Product.Long_Description: Primed and ready for long days on the open range, the Flat Bill Trucker Hat is a road trip essential.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Boulder T-Shirt - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Made with a soft, stretchy organic cotton jersey, the Black Diamond Boulder T-Shirt keeps up with all of our active outings, from bouldering to hiking to kicking back on the patio.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Watch Cap
