Product.Long_Description: An essential in any season, the BD beanie is iconic, serving up warmth, comfort, and style whenever and wherever there's a chill.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Camper Cap
Product.Long_Description: If you can hear a campfire, smell some bug spray, or hear an "on belay" in the distance you can bet we have our Black Diamond Camper Cap on. This classic cap shows that we mean business when we show up to any outdoor adventure.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Faded T-Shirt - Men's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"I love wearing the Faded T-Shirt both on and off the crag. The soft organic cotton blend feels great against my skin, and the touch of elastane provides just the right amount of stretch for climbing movements."We appreciate gear that seamlessly transitions from the gym to daily life, and the Black Diamond Faded T-Shirt does just that. Crafted from a soft blend of organic cotton and elastane, this tee offers comfort and mobility for both climbing sessions and casual outings. The regular fit and classic crew neck design make it a versatile addition to our wardrobe, whether we're scaling routes or meeting friends afterward.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Heritage Cap
Product.Long_Description: When our heads are turned up to the wall, the sun often tries to impede our vision of our sendy friends. But with the Heritage Cap on our crown, our eyes are shielded, and we can offer the proper encouragement, beta, or banter.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Chalked Up 2.0 T-Shirt - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Black Diamond's Chalked Up 2. 0 T-Shirt is a performance tee that's made with a stretchy organic cotton blend that's pre-shrunk and soft against our skin. .

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond BD Trucker Hat
Product.Long_Description: A staple at greasy-spoon diners from Lee Vining to North Conway, the BD Trucker Hat is the daily driver for post-work climbs and month-long road trips.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Oval Keylock Carabiner - 3-Pack
Product.Long_Description: The Oval Carabiner is Black Diamond's original biner for aid climbing, and this 3-Pack is essential for any big wall rack. Its uniform, symmetrical shape has a large carrying capacity for loads of stoppers, slings, and more. These are Black Diamond's only oval carabiners to come with a snag-free keylock nose. It's kind of like an "old meets new" thing.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond BD Brushed Hat
Product.Long_Description: With a front patch that pays homage to the mountains, this 100% brushed canvas cap comes with a curved brim for a broken-in feel and timeless fit, making it the hat youll grab no matter what the day has in store.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Pivot Tank Top - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Featuring our organic cotton, a slightly cropped, lat-clearing cut optimized for movement and breathability, and a twist racer back design purpose built for climbing, the Pivot Tank moves easily between climbing and everyday life, all while remaining stylish and comfortable.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Zip Lantern
Product.Long_Description: When the sun sets at camp, use the Black Diamond Zip Light to walk around camp and get into your tent. A combination of a lantern and flashlight, the Zip Light is a welcome addition to your car camping or backpacking kit. LED lights provide bright, clear illumination as well as being energy efficient so you can get the most mileage out of the four triple A batteries needed to power it. The IPX4 waterproof rating means that it can withstand rain and snow, and will still work if it takes a quick drop into the lake or in the creek.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Lightweight Screentap Glove - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Light, stretchy gloves with the added benefit of full touchscreen functionality, the Black Diamond LightWeight ScreenTap gloves are ideal for layering under your ski gloves, trail running or hiking with your smartphone. We started with a stretchy, lightweight fleece shell, then covered the entire palm with U|R Powered conductive material to allow for gloves-on touchscreen use.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Midweight Fleece Glove
Product.Long_Description: Our midweight fleece gloves built with windproof Polartec fleece, the Black Diamond MidWeight Fleece gloves are perfect for cold days on the skin track, the trail or around camp. The highly breathable fleece dries in a flash, and full goat leather palms provide a secure grip. Digital material on the thumb and index finger allow for gloves-on touchscreen functionality.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Replacement Tent Stakes - 6 Pack
Product.Long_Description: Black Diamond Replacement Tent Stakes will keep your tent staked down and guyed out when windy weather conditions demand it. If you've misplaced yours, lost them in your buddy's truck, or smashed them up against one too many rocks, these nice shiny aluminum replacements are just what you need.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Asymmetrical Flex Center Bar
Product.Long_Description: Comprised of a flexible spring steel, Black Diamonds Asymmetrical Flex Center Bars are aggressively curved for boots with highly asymmetrical soles. An asymmetrical center bar for modern mountain boots.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Bd Gaiter
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"This gaiter is the ultimate multi-purpose winter accessory. Whether I'm wearing it as a neck warmer or pulling it up over my face for wind protection, it keeps me warm and comfortable without feeling bulky. It's a staple in my pack for any cold-weather outing."Essential for winter pursuits, the BD Gaiter is designed to keep us protected from the elements during alpine climbs, ski tours, and cold-weather hikes. Made from lightweight polyester jersey, it's soft against the skin and easy to wear in a variety of ways-around the neck for warmth or pulled over the head and face for extra weather protection. The regular fit offers versatile coverage without adding bulk, making it an indispensable piece for any mountain adventure.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Gaiter
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"This little piece of gear punches way above its weight. I've used the BD Neck Gaiter for early morning ski tours and breezy belays-it traps just enough heat without making me overheat when I'm moving. It's simple, but a total essential for my winter kit."We never leave for the skintrack without the BD Neck Gaiter. Black Diamond brings their mountain-tested expertise to this ultra-soft, low-profile essential that guards us from freezing gusts and swirling spindrift on alpine missions and snowy hikes. Made from a cozy blend of polyester and elastane fleece, this gaiter delivers just the right amount of insulation without bulk. It fits easily under a helmet or hood, and the breathable, quick-drying fabric keeps us comfortable even when we're on the move. Whether we're logging dawn patrol laps or just walking the dog in the snow, it's the one piece of gear we forget we're even wearing-until we forget it.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Crampon Bag
Product.Long_Description: Crampons and soft gear mix about as well as ten people in a four-person elevator. Stash your mighty 'pons in the rough-and-tough Black Diamond Crampon bag to make sure there aren't any hurt feelings, ropes, or jackets when you unpack and rack up after the approach. Vinyl-coated nylon keeps the pointy parts away from the things that, frankly, don't like to be pointed at.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Ice Screwup
Product.Long_Description: The Black Diamond Ice Screwup is a roll-up bag with slots to hold six ice screws. Keep your teeth and threads sharp and protect your $300 down coat while you're at it. You'll be happy that you did. *Ice screws not included.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Adjustable Tip Loop Cable
Product.Long_Description: Bust the tip loop on your Black Diamond skins? No worries, just snap a new Adjustable Tip Loop Cable on and get climbing.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Oval Screwgate Carabiner
Product.Long_Description: The symmetrical shape of the Oval Screwgate Carabiner makes it a versatile piece of gear for our rack. Along with having more space to rig and being less likely to shift the load, this 'biner features a screwgate that's easy to operate with one hand.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Cord Tip Loop Kit
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"This kit is perfect for refreshing my skins. The durable cord and easy-to-install hardware ensure a snug, reliable fit, even after heavy use. A great way to keep skins performing like new."The Black Diamond Cord Tip Loop Kit is the essential solution for replacing worn-out tip loops and ensuring your climbing skins remain securely attached. Designed with durability and ease of use in mind, this kit includes everything you need to refresh your setup and keep your skins performing flawlessly. Whether you're upgrading old loops or repairing a favorite pair of skins, the reliable hardware and strong cord offer peace of mind on every ascent. Simple to install and built to last, this kit helps us stay focused on the climb ahead, knowing our gear is ready for the challenge.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Trekking Basket
Product.Long_Description: 60mm Trekking Basket for trekking or ski poles. Will not fit on most Z-poles except for the Distance Plus and Alpine series poles. Not compatible with Trail Sport poles or Helio fixed length poles. 60mm Trekking Basket Features 60mm Attaches to Flex tip or ski pole Ferrule

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Cirque 35L Backpack
Product.Long_Description: Despite being one of Black Diamond's lightest, the Cirque 35 Backpack boasts enough space for backcountry tours and ski mountaineering missions. Designed for minimalists backcountry skiers and ski mountaineers, the Cirque features only the basics but still retains a full-featured design. It carries skis diagonally or at an A-frame, as well as your helmet, avalanche safety gear, ice axes, and even a climbing rope. Although streamlined for minimalists, the Cirque still sports innovative technology that doesn't add a whole lot of weight to your back. The SwingArm shoulder straps and stretch waist belt provide active suspension and a streamlined fit. The Cirque is compatible with Black Diamond's AvaLung and SilNylon lid pocket for added safety and capacity when traveling in avalanche terrain.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Couloir Ultralight Harness
Product.Long_Description: Black Diamond Couloir Ultralight Harness offers us all of the weight savings and packability we demand from a snow-mission oriented harness. The hydrophobic construction works to prevent icing up while we belay out of an exposed ski line, meanwhile the dual ice screw keepers let us rely on this same harness while we ice climb.

Product.Product_Name: Evolv Zenist Climbing Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Delicate toe placement on microscopic footholds in the gym is a breeze when we're sporting Evolv's lightweight Zenist shoe. Designed to crush comp style setting, this aggressively downturned shoe features a rigid midsole that delivers optimal sensitivity and a tensioned rand for powerful toe positioning and minimal stretching over time.

Product.Product_Name: Evolv Zenist Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: We strap on the Zenist Climbing Shoe for aggressive performance when pulling out of the cave on plastic holds and for solid smearing ability to top out when feet get scarce in the upper half. A streamlined slip-on design with a hook-and-loop strap eliminates dead space for better sensitivity, precision, and power. We enjoy reliable heel and toe hooks resole after resole with the synthetic upper keeping its snug fit longer than leather uppers.

Product.Product_Name: Evolv Geshido Lace Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: Designed for a wide variety of terrain, Evolv's Geshido Lace gives us ultimate confidence on overhanging boulders and long vertical routes, both outdoors and at the gym. The leather upper allows stretch over time for a comfortable, molded fit while the downturned profile gives you an aggressive stance for ideal performance on your next project.

Product.Product_Name: Evolv Geshido Lace Climbing Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: After a few warmups, we lace up our sending shoes, the Geshido Lace Climbing Shoe. The unlined leather upper molded to our feet, making this our most comfortable aggressive climbing shoe. The thinner heel rand gives for effective smearing while the dark spine heel midsole provides the rigidity we need to power through the toe in overhanging sections.

Product.Product_Name: Evolv Rebel Approach Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Compared to Evolv's other approach shoes, the Women's Rebel Approach Shoe is more durable than the Cruzer and more casual than the Zender. It's ideal for climbers who want to frequent sport crags, climbing gyms, and hangouts in the same shoe. The Rebel's vegan upper is ruggedly water-resistant to keep clean on a rainy, muddy day.

Product.Product_Name: Evolv Rebel Approach Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: We know the best routes are often the hardest to get to, so we lace up the Evolv Rebel Approach Shoe. These approach shoes let us stay focused on our ultimate goal of the day by keeping our feet happy while we hike and scramble to the base.

Product.Product_Name: Evolv Rebel Approach Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Sometimes we head to the gym and end up at the crag. Evolv's Rebel Approach Shoe has the style and performance we want no matter where we end up. It's a bit burlier than Evolv's casual line of approach shoes, and slightly better-suited for easy trails too.

Product.Product_Name: Evolv Sling Flip Flop - Men's
Product.Long_Description: After spending hours crammed into climbing shoes, our toes wriggle excitedly into the Sling Flip Flop. The soft straps caress the tops of our feet, while the cushy bed gives our soles solace. Whether we're cragging or at the rock gym, the rugged outsole delivers long-lasting grip.

Product.Product_Name: Evolv Liquid Chalk
Product.Long_Description: Liquid Chalk stripped of all fillers, no rosin, or other additives, 80% ethanol + magnesium carbonate + water; guaranteed to keep your hands dry and sanitized.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Kestrel BOA Mountain Bike Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Completely redesigned to be our partner in crime on our speediest of singletrack missions, the Five Ten Kestrel BOA Mountain Bike Shoe is lightweight, durable, and downright comfortable. Made from recycled materials, the abrasion-resistant and hyper-breathable upper features a combination of hook-and-loop straps and a BOA system to create one of the most secure and customizable fits on the market. This interaction of the Kestrel continues the tradition of super tacky Stealth rubber on the sole, but in this case, the Stealth Marathon Rubber lugs are bolstered by a full-length glass fiber-reinforced plate for insane amounts of power transfer.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Kestrel BOA Mountain Bike Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Completely redesigned to handle the demands of cross-country racing and downcountry riding, the Five Ten Kestrel BOA Mountain Bike Shoe is built for speed and comfort. Made with recycled materials, the abrasion-resistant upper is hyper-breathable and features two hook-and-loop straps and a BOA closure so that we can dial in our ideal fit for high-output rides. A full-length glass fiber-reinforced plate allows us to really put the hammer down on the climbs and is bolstered by Stealth Marathon rubber lugs for insane amounts of traction off the bike.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Trailcross Pro Clip-In Cycling Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: When lightweight performance is our priority, the Five Ten Trailcross Pro Clip-In Cycling Shoe is our go-to. Designed mainly as a mountain bike shoe but with a running shoe style and fit, the Trailcross Pro Clip-In has on and off-bike performance. The lightweight and breathable mesh upper promotes airflow, while the raised heel cup keeps our feet firmly secured inside the shoe. Five Ten's Stealth Marathon rubber outsole provides an excellent grip when we need to hike our bike, and the 2-bolt, midfoot cleat placement gives us tons of stability on the bike. An EVA midsole helps to absorb the shock transferred through the pedals, and a stiffened toe cap helps to shrug off rock strikes.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Trailcross Mid Pro Mountain Bike Shoe
Product.Long_Description: Designed with adventurous trail riding in mind, the Five Ten Trailcross Mid Pro Mountain Bike Shoes blend a lightweight yet durable hiking-friendly build with a grippy Stealth rubber outsole that provides positive traction on flat pedals. The result is a shoe that's equally at home on or off the bike, making it a great option for bikepacking trips in the desert, adventurous trail rides in unfamiliar mountain terrain, and trail building.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Hellcat Pro Cycling Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Built for battle on the trails through rain or shine, the Five Ten Men's Hellcat Pro Shoe barrels around berms and flies through pump tracks with confident comfort and protective performance. A lace and hook-and-loop closure combo cinches down the perfect fit quickly and easily, while its synthetic upper with DWR-treatment helps keep your feet dry when splashing through creeks or facing light rain storms. Meanwhile, the 3/4 dual-density, chatter-dampening TPU shank flexes when you want it for walking, and then stays rigid when you need it for pedaling. Comfort and support is further bolstered by the compression-molded EVA midsole without adding weight, and the Stealth C4 rubber outsole absorbs shock and reduces vibration while staying grippy on and off the bike.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Hellcat Pro Cycling Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Fiesty and agile, the new interaction of the FiveTen Hellcat Cycling Pro Shoes are all that and more on our feet. When we're hitting drops and gaps as big as the ones at our local bike park, we need the most aggressive and sticky shoe we can find. Abrasion-resistant and durable as well, these shoes won't fall apart after a handful of big park days.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Freerider Pro Mid VCS Cycling Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Made for bombing enduro trails and ripping some downhill laps, the Freerider Pro Mids give us enhanced impact protection in the box and inner ankle. They use a mid-height ankle cuff to keep out dirt and debris, as well as a Stealth rubber outsole for the best possible grip on our flat pedals.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Trailcross Mid Pro Mountain Bike Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Designed with adventurous trail riding in mind, these shoes blend a lightweight yet durable hiking-friendly build with a grippy Stealth rubber outsole that provides positive traction on flat pedals. The result is a shoe that's equally at home on or off the bike, making it a great option for bikepacking trips in the desert, adventurous trail rides in unfamiliar mountain terrain, and trail building. This mid-top version adds some additional protection to the mix thanks to D3O inserts on the collar that absorb the shock from impacts, along with a neoprene cuff that keeps mud, muck, and debris from entering the shoe.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Hellcat Pro Cycling Shoe
Product.Long_Description: When racing down our favorite technical descent, there is no time to second guess our footwear: We trust the Five Ten Hellcat Pro mountain bike shoes for their premium construction, gravity-oriented build, and stylish, low-profile design. Made with a tough textile upper fabric and finished with abrasion-resistant welds in critical areas, the Hellcat is super durable and can withstand aggressive riding. A stiffened toecap guards against rock strikes, and a dense EVA midsole absorbs impacts from heavy landings. The Hellcat features a 2-bolt clipless pedal compatibility, so we can always stay locked into our ride. The lace and hook-and-loop strap provide a secure closure, and the renowned Stealth Marathon rubber outsole provides unwavering grip in all trail conditions.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Impact Pro Mid Cycling Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: From railing down black diamonds to hitting the jump lines with the buds, when we are riding aggressively, we need mountain bike-specific shoes that protect our feet. The Five Ten Impact Pro Mid Cycling Shoe is one of our top choices when we need a protective mountain bike shoe that has all the necessary features. Complete with a mid-top design, D3O impact protection, Five Ten's trusted rubber outsole, and a simple lace closure; the Impact Pro is ready for full-gas downhill riding. A mid-top design gives a little more support and includes inside ankle protection. An impact-resistant, reinforced toe box protects our feet from rock strikes, and a compression-molded PU midsole absorbs energy from hard landings. The synthetic upper is super durable, quick-drying, and abrasion-resistant, and a lace closure ensures we get the perfect fit every time. To stay locked into the pedals, Five Ten used their signature Stealth S1 Dotty rubber outsole to provide us an excellent grip both on and off the bike, and the durable rubber compound stands up to the wear and tear of metal pedal pins. Finally, a stiff shank gives us the support we need and aids in power transfer to the pedals.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Freerider Pro Boa Cycling Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"The Freerider Pro Boa is perfect for riders who demand performance on flat pedals. The BOA Fit System lets me dial in a secure fit quickly, and the grippy Stealth rubber sole keeps my feet planted no matter how rough the trail gets."The Five Ten Freerider Pro Boa Cycling Shoe blends innovative fit technology with trusted trail performance. The BOA Fit System provides micro-adjustable precision, locking in a secure and comfortable fit for confident pedal control. Paired with the legendary Stealth S1 rubber outsole, this shoe ensures unbeatable grip on flat pedals for technical terrain and fast descents. Built for durability and comfort, the synthetic upper resists moisture and trail debris, while the reinforced toe box adds protection against unexpected impacts. Whether tackling challenging features or cruising flow trails, the Freerider Pro Boa delivers the confidence and control we need to ride at our best.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Freerider Pro Boa Cycling Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"The Freerider Pro BOA is my go-to for flat pedal riding. The BOA Fit System locks in a secure fit, while the Stealth S1 rubber gives unmatched grip. It's lightweight, durable, and performs flawlessly on technical terrain."Built for riders who push their limits, the Five Ten Freerider Pro BOA Cycling Shoe combines innovative fit technology with trusted trail performance. The BOA Fit System ensures a precise, micro-adjustable fit, giving us unmatched stability on technical trails. Paired with the legendary Stealth S1 rubber outsole, these shoes provide unparalleled grip and confidence on flat pedals. The synthetic upper is lightweight, durable, and ready to tackle muddy trails and rocky descents, while the reinforced toe box adds protection where we need it most. Whether we're sending big jumps or carving technical lines, the Freerider Pro BOA is the ultimate companion for trail domination.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Trailcross Clip-In Cycling Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: With the Five Ten Trailcross Clip-In Cycling Shoe, we don't have to sacrifice off-the-bike grip for on-bike control when we head out on the trail. When the trail gets tough or too steep, and we have to hike our bike, the Stealth Marathon rubber outsole adds ample grip, ensuring we're not slipping around on loose, rocky terrain. The 2-bolt cleat-compatible design gives us a highly efficient pedal stroke every time, while the EVA midsole helps soak up big drops and trail chatter.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Trailcross Clip-In Cycling Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The days of sacrificing the ability to hike our bike up the side of a mountain for the pedal control of being clipped in are over. The Five Ten Trailcross Clip-In Cycling Shoe is built to keep our feet comfortable and protected on all of our trail adventures, no matter how gnarly the trail ahead is. The Stealth Marathon rubber outsole features the legendary Dotty tread so that we're not slipping around on steep trails, while the 2-bolt compatible plate allows us to lock in a highly efficient pedal stroke every time. The highly breathable upper gets abrasion-resistant overlays and an impact-resistant toe box to help fight off painful rock strikes and encounters with trail brush.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Trailcross Clip-In Cycling Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: We all seek a shoe that is just as good off the bike as on the bike. The Trailcross Clip-In Cycling Shoe is the perfect shoe to keep your foot comfortable and protected while riding and allows you to hike your bike with the confidence that you won't slip down steep trails. The upper of the Trailcross is complete with abrasion-resistant overlays and an impact-resistant toe box, giving you the confidence to go hard on difficult trails. The outsole, made from a Stealth Marathon rubber, gives you extra grip on slippery and steep sections you can't ride up on your bike.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Trailcross Clip-In Cycling Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: With the Trailcross Clip-In Cycling Shoe, exploring your favorite trail both on and off the bike has never been easier. When the terrain gets difficult and you need to hike your bike, the stealth marathon rubber adds extra grip to ensure fewer slips on rocky terrain. Also including a lightweight and cushioned midsole, extra comfort is added when you're on the ground or in the pedals. Designed for 2-bolt clip-in cleats, you are sure to get the most efficient pedal stroke from each push. The hook-and-loop straps also work together with the lace closure system to make sure your foot stays secure with each stroke.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Hellcat Cycling Shoe
Product.Long_Description: When we are riding aggressively, no ordinary shoe s going to cut it. We trust the Five Ten Hellcat shoe for its premium construction, gravity-oriented use, and casual style. The Hellcat Mountain bike shoes offer a leather upper that is super durable and abrasion-resistant, and a molded interior sock liner keeps our feet comfortable all ride long. A dense EVA midsole absorbs shock and vibrations from the trail and a stiffened toe cap provides protection from rocks on the trail. Five Ten's Stealth Marathon rubber outsole provides us with top-of-the-line grip and traction, and the 2-bolt clipless compatibility allows us to stay clipped into the pedals for better pedaling efficiency.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Trailcross XT Cycling Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: With ultra-sticky Stealth Phantom rubber and an impact-resistant toe box, the Five Ten Trailcross XT is built for our biggest adventures. The legendary Dotty outsole ensures we have tons of grip on our pedals, while directional lugs on the heel and siped lugs on the toe give us a steady grip when we have to hike our bike up steep faces. This updated design includes added heel and ankle support for stable footing on and off the bike.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Hellcat Cycling Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The classic Five Ten Hellcat is back at it again with a lighter, more streamlined design that's great for everyone from world-class enduro racers to weekend warriors. We like that the Hellcat still caters to indecisive riders who might clip in for a mellow day on smooth flow trails but leave the flats on for burlier days in the desert. It also makes for an ideal first mountain shoe if you have the goal of going clipless someday.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Hellcat Cycling Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Finding comfort in gravity situations on the bike can be tricky, but with FiveTen Hellcat Cycling shoes we're more confident on the pedals than ever. When we're hitting drops and gaps as big as the ones at our local bike park, we need the most aggressive and sticky shoe we can find. Abrasion-resistant and durable as well, these shoes won't fall apart after a handful of big park days.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Freerider Pro Canvas Cycling Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Five Ten Freerider Pro Canvas Cycling Shoe is right at home all across the mountain, from step-ups and no-handers at the bike park to gnarly high alpine descents. Constructed from recycled polyester and Parley Ocean Plastic, it features an impact-resistant toe box and the legendary Stealth S1 rubber outsole with Dotty tread for unmatched pedal grip.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Freerider Pro Cycling Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Whether we are hitting the jump lines or just cruising around, having mountain bike-specific shoes makes a huge difference. The Five Ten Freerider Pro Cycling Shoe is one of our top choices when we need a no-nonsense mountain bike shoe that has all the necessary features. An impact-resistant toebox protects our feet from rock strikes, and a molded EVA midsole absorbs energy from hard landings. The synthetic upper is super durable, quick-drying, and abrasion-resistant, and a lace closure ensures we get the perfect fit every time. To stay locked into the pedals, Five Ten used their signature Stealth S1 Dotty rubber outsole to provide us an excellent grip with platform pedals, and a durable rubber compound stands up to the wear and tear of pedal pins. Finally, an Ortholite sock liner and footbed keep us comfortable all ride long.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Freerider Pro Canvas Cycling Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: From big days at the bike park to our daily trail ride, the Five Ten Freerider Pro Canvas is right at home and sits high atop our list of choices in flat pedal mountain bike shoes. The legendary Stealth S1 rubber sole keeps our feet securely planted on the pedals as we smash through chunder and float effortlessly over drops. And compared to the original Freerider, the Pro model gets a sleek profile and an impact-resistant toe box.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Trailcross XT Cycling Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: High cuff and high brow, these Trailcross XT Cycling Shoes from FiveTen mean we can be comfortable playing all day, day-after-day. With durable and sticky Stealth Rubber, these signature shoes are what we use for big day-hikes and when we're on the bike.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Freerider Pro Cycling Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: When we are mountain biking, wearing mountain bike-specific shoes makes a huge difference. The Five Ten Freerider Pro Cycling Shoe is one of our top choices when we need a mountain bike shoe with all the necessary features. The synthetic upper is super durable, quick-drying, and abrasion-resistant, and a lace closure ensures we get the perfect fit every time. An impact-resistant toebox protects our feet from rock strikes, and a molded EVA midsole absorbs energy from rough trails and hard landings. Five Ten used their signature Stealth S1 Dotty rubber outsole to provide us with an excellent grip both on and off the bike, and a durable rubber compound stands up to the wear and tear of pedal pins. Finally, with an Ortholite sock liner and footbed, our feet are comfortable all ride long.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Sleuth DLX Canvas Cycling Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: When racing down our favorite technical descent, there is no time to second guess our footwear. We trust the Five Ten Sleuth DLX Canvas mountain bike shoes for their premium construction, trail-oriented build, and stylish and low-profile design. Made with a durable canvas upper fabric, the Sleuth DLX is super durable and can withstand aggressive riding. A stiffened toecap guards against rock strikes, and an EVA midsole absorbs impacts and vibrations from the trail. The Sleuth DLX Canvas features a flat pedal-compatible sole with a sticky Stealth Phantom rubber to give us tons of grip on our pedals.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Freerider DLX Cycling Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Your favorite off-road shoes have proven their worth time and again, but can they keep up when you take to the streets? If a slim profile and clipless equipment can't handle life beyond the trail, throw on the Five Ten Freerider DLX Cycling Shoe. Its durable rubber outsole offers superior traction through the mud, and grips the sidewalk for a post-ride drink with friends. The synthetic upper is treated with a DWR finish to repel rain and moisture, and offers sleek styling for smooth transitions from the peaks to the pavement.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Freerider DLX Cycling Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Classic flat pedal performance. These adidas Five Ten Freerider DLX Mountain Bike Shoes offer the same legendary flat pedal control as the Freerider. The synthetic and coated leather upper raises the bar for style, durability and weather resistance. Stealth(R) S1(TM) rubber and a Dotty tread keep your feet firmly planted on the pedals. Ride, hang out and ride some more.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Sleuth DLX Canvas Cycling Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Lightweight yet durable, the Five Ten Sleuth DLX Canvas shoes are built for mountain bikers looking to reduce their environmental impact. The EVA midsole cushions for comfort during long rides while the Stealth rubber outsole, equipped with a Dotty tread pattern, provides multi-directional grip so you can focus on the trail ahead. Made from recycled ocean plastics, these shoes allow you to do your part in keeping the outdoors pristine. Slip them on, clip in and experience the freedom of the open trail.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Trailcross LT Cycling Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Taking a sharp turn from the overbuilt mountain bike shoes Five Ten is known for, the Trailcross LT Cycling Shoe is built more like a trail running shoe with its minimalist, low-profile design. The idea is to have a shoe that performs well on the bike but won't hold us back when we're hiking or chilling at camp. Something that works well for scrambling up rocky portages with our bike on our back, bikepacking along an unfamiliar route, or building our own trails deep in the forest.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Trailcross LT Mountain Bike Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: With the look, fit, and feel of a running shoe, and a the technical features of a mountain bike shoe, the Five Ten Trailcross LT Mountain Bike Shoe is our go-to when we need a trail shoe that can perform on and off the bike. Features like a breathable synthetic mesh upper for airflow, an EVA midsole to cushion our feet and provide support, and a lace closure for a snug fit. Five Ten's Stealth Phantom rubber outsole provides unrelenting traction with our platform pedals, and the toe and heel of the tread feature ramped tread blocks for off-bike traction.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Freerider Cycling Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Five Ten Freerider is a time-tested Gearhead favorite for wear on and off the mountain thanks to its all-day comfort and grippy rubber outsole. Constructed from durable suede leather and airy mesh, the upper is built to stand up to our gnarliest rides yet keep our feet from overheating on hot days out in the desert. The Stealth S1 outsole has Five Ten's legendary dotty sole pattern to keep us planted on the pedals through rocky descents and technical climbs, while the traditional lace closure lets us lock in our ideal fit.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Freerider Canvas Cycling Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: From the bike park to the barstool, the Five Ten Freerider Canvas Cycling Shoe delivers uncompromising grip and comfort no matter where we're headed. The Stealth S1 rubber with the legendary Dotty outsole pattern ensures our feet stay planted on the pedals through technical terrain, and the canvas upper is built from a combination of upcycled Parley Ocean Plastic and recycled polyester allowing the shoe to breathe so we don't end up with soaked socks when the temps start to skyrocket.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Freerider Cycling Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Whether we're just starting out on our mountain biking journey or racing enduro, the Five Ten Freeriders are one of our favorite flat pedal shoes out there. The ultra-grippy Stealth S1 rubber outsole keeps us locked into our pedals over rocky terrain and is designed to hold up long rides and having to hike our bikes up granite slabs. The leather and mesh uppers are breathable even as our rides heat up, keeping our feet cool and comfortable all ride long.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Sleuth Cycling Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Everybody knows Five Ten makes the stickiest rubber around, but the company is more renowned for making climbing, approach, and biking shoes than casual kicks like the Sleuth Shoes. That said, Five Ten's casual is different than most brands'. The Sleuth is down to kick back, but its sticky Stealth Marathon rubber helps it grip like a fiend to skate decks and dirt-jumping pedals, so you can rock it as a one-shoe quiver for all your chilled-out adventures.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Sleuth Cycling Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: From hitting the jump lines to trail rides ripping through flowing singletrack, the Five Ten Sleuth mountain bike shoes are our go-to shoe when we are looking for a low-profile, lightweight shoe that is loaded with features. Made with a durable textile upper fabric, the Sleuth is durable, breathable, and lightweight. The Sleuth features Stealth Marathon rubber to give us tons of grip on our pedals, and the dotty tread works perfectly with platform pedal pins to give us that 'locked-in' feeling when we are riding. A stiffened toecap guards against rock strikes, and an EVA midsole absorbs impacts and vibrations from the trail.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Freerider Pro Canvas Cycling Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Ideal for everything from park laps to day-to-day trail riding, the Freerider Pro Canvas is one of our top choices in flat pedal mountain bike shoes. The secret formula is the Stealth rubber sole, which keeps our feet securely on the pedals when we're smashing through chunder and floating over ledges and drops. Compared to the standard Freerider, this Pro model gets a sleeker profile as well as the addition of an impact-resistant toe box.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Stratos Hybrid Ski Boot - 2025
Product.Long_Description: Designed to get you deep into the backcountry but leave some cash in your wallet, the La Sportiva Stratos Hybrid Ski Boot has everything we need and nothing we don't. This lugged sole touring boots steals its cuff from higher priced boots in the line to promise performance on the downhill, while the walk mode opens up plenty of range of motion on the up. A waterproof gaiter keeps your socks dry throughout the day, S4 binding inserts make click ins quick and east, and FriXion soles encourage you to boot pack to the ridge.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Salto Ski - 2024
Product.Long_Description: The Salto Ski is one of La Sportiva's most versatile backcountry skis that you can ride on the highest summits or through trees near the mountain's base. Its nimble 92mm waist certainly rides firmer snow better than powder, but the rockered tip and tail help keep you afloat when the snow's softer and deeper than you expected. The Salto has plenty of camber for the precise edge control necessary for tight, steep chutes.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Vanguard Alpine Touring Boot - 2025 - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Vanguard Alpine Touring Boot is focused on taking us into the backcountry to find powder. The tech fittings work with our trusted backcountry bindings, while the roomy 102. 5mm last and Vibram outsole encourage us to boot pack to the top of any rocky ridge. On the descent, the 3-buckle design and Ultralon Performance liner lock our heels in place so that we can properly trust the 130 flex to drive our skis without losing power.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Capo Ski - 2024
Product.Long_Description: They say powder days are rare, but with La Sportiva's Capo Ski we're willing to push another mile or ten in search of the soft stuff. We like that La Sportiva sized it for powder and built it light enough for long-distant touring. A full rocker gives a surfy feel in soft snow, and the progressive sidecut stops on a dime when the only soft snow left is at no-fall zones.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Vanguard Alpine Touring Boot - 2025 - Men's
Product.Long_Description: When the approach is long and the drop is steep, we buckle into La Sportiva's Vanguard Alpine Touring Boot. The lightweight build and impressive range of motion keep us efficient on the climb, while the firm, progressive flex delivers instant energy transfer to our skis on the descent.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Skorpius CR Alpine Touring Boot - 2025
Product.Long_Description: The Skorpius CR is a lightweight touring boot for general backcountry skiing but borrows technology from La Sportiva's SkiMo race boots to supply ultimate uphill efficiency. Situated neatly between La Sportiva's SkiMo race boots and their freeride line, this alpine touring boot is equally at home going lap after lap in North-facing deepness or traveling peak to peak on race day.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Kilo Ski Boot - 2025 - Women's
Product.Long_Description: "The Kilo Ski Boot is a game-changer for ski mountaineers. It's unbelievably light at just 1000g, making ascents feel easier, and the Grilamid Bio Based LF Carbon(TM) shell adds stiffness without the weight. The Force(TM) closure system keeps my foot locked in on the descent, delivering confidence even on technical lines. It's the perfect blend of uphill efficiency and downhill performance."The Kilo Ski Boot is crafted for serious ski mountaineers who value ultralight ascents without sacrificing downhill control. La Sportiva's innovative use of Grilamid Bio Based LF Carbon(TM) in the shell and cuff creates a boot that is both incredibly light and impressively rigid, delivering performance in both directions. The new Force(TM) shell closure system allows us to dial in the perfect fit, distributing pressure evenly for comfort and control. At just 1000 grams, every gram has been optimized for functionality, making the Kilo the ultimate choice for demanding ascents and descents in technical terrain.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Kilo Ski Boot - 2025
Product.Long_Description: When ski mountaineering routes have a tricky uphill and a demanding downhill, we are happy to have our feet in theLa Sportiva Kilo Ski Boot. These lightweight boots rely on a Tilt-Lock walk mode lever to open up 70deg of motion on the ascent, a Grilamid construction that is lightweight yet rigid, and a Force Power Buckle that locks our shin in place so that we can hop turn tight shoots or hold an edge on open pitches.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Solar Alpine Touring Boot - 2025
Product.Long_Description: Designed for touring and ski mountaineering, and boasting more than enough performance for some light skimo, the La Sportiva Solar Alpine Touring Boot is our go-to lightweight touring boot. The combination of a 90 flex and 102mm last offer comfort that inspires us to stroll to remote peaks. Meanwhile, the EZ Flex Overlap Tongue and Swing-Lock Closure ensure a precise fit that inspires confident as we stare over the tips of our skis.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Vega Alpine Touring Boot - 2025
Product.Long_Description: Vega is among the brightest stars we can see from Earth, and a worthy namesake for the Vega Alpine Touring Boots, which shine bright both on the skin track and in the white room. Since backcountry touring usually involves more time on the uphill than doing the fun stuff, cuff rotation and fit are important features in a boot. Among its class, the Vega boasts a larger than normal range of motion, with an impressive 60 degrees of travel in the cuff. Combine this with the EZ Flex instep and roomy 102 last, and uphill travel becomes decidedly less sloggish. And worry not. Once you're ready to ride the ride, snap the boot back into ski mode and enjoy the rigid performance of a carbon-reinforced spine.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Vega Alpine Touring Boot - 2025 - Women's
Product.Long_Description: We started to get tired of the lack of downhill performance provided by dinky touring boots so we turned to the La Sportiva Vega Alpine Touring Boot. This boot thrives on the downhill with a stiff 115 flex and 4-buckle design. Sure this means the uphill will be a little harder, but a huge 60deg range of motion lets us stride naturally.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Supercouloir 1000 Down Jacket - Women's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"The Supercouloir 1000 Down Jacket is the ultimate insulation piece for mountaineering and winter expeditions. The 1000-fill down provides unparalleled warmth without adding weight, and the mix of premium materials ensures maximum compressibility and freedom of movement. I love the helmet-compatible hood, thoughtfully placed pockets, and the Pertex(R) Quantum shell, which repels moisture while staying incredibly breathable. Whether tackling alpine summits or braving frigid backcountry conditions, this jacket is a game-changer."For those who demand the highest level of warmth and performance, the Supercouloir 1000 Down Jacket is engineered for extreme environments. Built with 1000-fill power down, this jacket offers unmatched insulation in a featherlight package, ensuring you stay warm without the bulk. The Pertex(R) Quantum shell with a PFC-free DWR finish provides superior wind and water resistance, keeping you protected from the elements. Designed with movement in mind, this jacket features an articulated fit, an adjustable helmet-compatible hood, and a waist hem drawstring for a customizable, snug seal against the cold. Thoughtfully placed pockets, including invisible-zip hand pockets, a storage pocket, and an internal mesh compression pocket, provide ample storage for essentials while keeping them secure. Whether climbing icy peaks or navigating deep backcountry terrain, the Supercouloir 1000 Down Jacket is the pinnacle of alpine insulation.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Trango Tech GTX Mountaineering Boot - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Trango Tech GTX Mountaineering Boot confidently tackles all types of terrain. It bridges the gap between mountaineering and backpacking for travel in the mountains. A low profile midsole and sole construction allow technical footwork and edging capability when you're climbing easier graded routes while a TPU insert allows semi-automatic crampon compatibility for glacier travel. Throughout your treks, the waterproof uppers and Gore-Tex membrane keep your feet dry and comfortable on muddy trails and through shallow streams while a gusset free tongue enhances comfort during long days in the mountains. Additionally, the Trango features a 3D Flex system for precises support on rough, uneven trails and a to-the-toe lacing system that delivers a precise fit for enhanced control that's appreciated whether you're climbing a new route or traversing technical terrain.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Bivouac Down Jacket - Men's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"The Bivouac Down Jacket is my go-to for frigid alpine starts and long ski tours. The 750-fill recycled down keeps me incredibly warm without adding bulk, and the Pertex(R) Quantum fabric blocks wind without sacrificing breathability. I also love the insulated, adjustable hood for extra protection when the temps drop. Whether I'm layering under a shell or using it as a standalone piece, this jacket delivers serious warmth in a lightweight, packable design."From frosty summit pushes to backcountry ski tours, the Bivouac Down Jacket is built to handle extreme cold without weighing you down. Packed with 750-fill P. U. R. E. recycled down, it delivers high-loft warmth while keeping sustainability in mind. The Pertex(R) Quantum shell offers windproof protection, ensuring you stay comfortable in exposed alpine conditions. Designed with thoughtful features like an articulated, insulated hood, zippered hand and chest pockets, and a storm flap for added protection, this jacket is ready for any winter adventure. The lightweight, compressible design makes it easy to stash in your pack, ensuring you're always prepared when the temperature drops. Made with fully recycled fabric and insulation, the Bivouac Down Jacket is an eco-conscious choice for cold-weather explorers.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Bivouac Down Jacket - Women's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"The Bivouac Down Jacket is my go-to for frigid conditions. The 750-fill P. U. R. E. recycled down provides exceptional warmth without weighing me down, and the Pertex(R) Quantum fabric keeps wind out while maintaining breathability. The adjustable hood and hem help seal in heat, and the zippered pockets keep my essentials secure. Whether I'm ski touring or just braving winter's worst, this jacket has me covered."When the temperature drops, the Bivouac Down Jacket is built to keep you warm. Designed with 750-fill P. U. R. E. recycled down, this jacket offers high-loft insulation with minimal weight, ensuring optimal warmth for cold-weather adventures. The Pertex(R) Quantum shell is both windproof and lightweight, allowing for easy layering without sacrificing protection. With an adjustable, insulated hood, zippered hand pockets, and a hem drawstring for a customizable fit, this jacket is a must-have for winter expeditions. Reflective details enhance visibility in low-light conditions, and the compressible design makes it easy to stash in a pack when the sun comes out. Made from recycled materials and finished with a PFC-free durable water repellent coating, the Bivouac Down Jacket is as eco-conscious as it is performance-driven.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Cyklon Cross GTX Trail Running Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: We don't put our runs on hold when there's snow on the ground, and with some help from the Cyklon Cross GTX Trail Running Shoe we take them on with confidence. Equipped with GORE-TEX, streamlined gaiters, and aggressive soles, this shoe fends off mud, snow, and slippery surfaces to keep our feet dry and protected on wintry trails.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Blizzard GTX Trail Running Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Blizzard GTX Trail Running Shoe was designed for those of us who don't shy away from the trail even when it's painted with a fresh coat of snow. Its high-traction outsole, waterproof construction, and built-in gaiter all help us thrive in tough terrain and even tougher conditions. The GORE-TEX membrane offers best-in-class protection from frigid moisture when you're slogging through snow and slush, while a no-nonsense outsole ensures that you won't be slipping up on technical trails. Not only is this outsole equipped with deep lugs and a grippy rubber compound, but it also comes with integrated tungsten spikes that dig into ice, packed snow, and other slippery surfaces to ensure that you won't have to slow down when the going gets a bit tricky.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Nucleo High II GTX Wide Boot - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Nucleo High II GTX Wide Boot is what we strap up when we're getting ready for intense hikes in the backcountry. The durable Vibram tread looks more like something we'd normally find on an overlander vehicle while the tall lace-up build keeps our ankles protected. This mid-duty boot is made with water-resistant GORE-TEX material too and helps us get across stream crossing without issue.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Nucleo High II GTX Boot - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Nucleo High II GTX Boot suits our needs for warm-weather backpacking excursions thanks to its highly ventilated design. This boot utilizes a GORE-TEX Surround lining thats among the lightest waterproof liners in the GORE-TEX line, supplying maximum airflow while maintaining top-tier waterproofing.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Mythic Primaloft Jacket - Men's
Product.Long_Description: We like to climb, ski, travel, and hike, all of which are exceptional times to rock the La Sportiva Mythic Primaloft Jacket. Vapovent construction allows this jacket to breathe well when we work up a sweat, while the nylon face fabric handles daily wear and tear, and the Primaloft Silver Eco lining traps our body heat without hurting our ability to move.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Nucleo High II GTX Boot - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Nucleo High II GTX Boot braves nasty weather on muddy trails, and it's comfortably versatile enough for hiking in warmer, dryer conditions, too. We appreciate its GORE-TEX waterproofing laminated to a durable leather upper, and the flex zone around the ankle that allows greater mobility. Underfoot, a solid combination of cush EVA and Vibram rubber keeps us comfortably sure-footed on all trails.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Pinnacle Down Jacket - Women's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"The Pinnacle Down Jacket is my go-to for staying warm without bulk on ski tours and alpine adventures. The 750-fill recycled down packs serious warmth, while the diamond-quilt construction keeps it evenly distributed. I love the articulated hood and lightweight design, making it easy to stash in my pack when conditions change. Plus, the recycled materials and PFC-free DWR give it an eco-friendly edge."Designed for high-alpine pursuits, the Pinnacle Down Jacket delivers lightweight warmth in a sleek, breathable package. Featuring 750-fill P. U. R. E. recycled goose down insulation, it provides an excellent warmth-to-weight ratio, keeping you toasty in cold conditions without feeling bulky. The Pertex(R) Quantum shell adds windproof protection while maintaining a soft, packable feel, perfect for layering or standalone wear. Thoughtful details like an adjustable, insulated hood, zippered hand and chest pockets, and reflective accents make it an essential piece for ski touring, climbing, or winter trekking. With a durable, PFC-free water-repellent finish and fully recycled construction, the Pinnacle Down Jacket blends sustainability with performance for adventurers who demand the best.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Mythic Primaloft Jacket - Women's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"The Mythic Primaloft Jacket is my go-to for ski touring and alpine missions. It's impressively warm for its weight, thanks to the Primaloft Silver Eco insulation, while the Vapovent(TM) technology keeps things breathable when I'm working hard. The stretch panels give me full mobility, and I love that it's made entirely from recycled materials. Whether I'm layering it under a shell or wearing it on its own, this jacket delivers comfort and performance in one sleek package."From frigid alpine starts to summit pushes, the Mythic Primaloft Jacket is built for movement in cold conditions. Designed with a thoughtful blend of warmth, breathability, and stretch, this technical midlayer keeps you insulated without overheating. The Primaloft Silver Eco insulation locks in warmth, while Vapovent(TM) technology allows excess heat to escape, ensuring you stay comfortable on high-output missions. The articulated design moves with you, while stretch fabric in the sleeves and sides provides unrestricted mobility for climbing, skinning, or scrambling. A storm-ready hood, zippered pockets, and PFC-free water-repellent coating round out the features, making this jacket a reliable companion for skiers, climbers, and backcountry explorers alike. Lightweight, packable, and crafted from 100% recycled materials, it's the sustainable choice for technical pursuits.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Nucleo High II GTX Wide Boot - Women's
Product.Long_Description: When we are pushing the last few miles to a summit we are always happy to have the La Sportiva Nucleo High II GTX Wide Boot. In addition to the wider last to accommodate feet that sometimes feel jammed, this boot provides waterproof coverage and ample energy return to keep our tired legs moving forward.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Testarossa Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: The Testarossa is one of La Sportiva's more aggressive climbing shoes designed with hard boulders and overhung sport routes in mind. Its highly asymmetric downturn grips overhung jugs, tiptoes micro-edges, and works through blank sections with technical precision. It's one of the first climbing shoes to pair a stiff toe box with a flexible arch for better agility on steep and vertical climbs alike. La Sportive redesigned the heel for a snugger fit that feels more secure on heel hooks.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Genius Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: La Sportiva calls the Genius Climbing Shoe its highest performing shoe for boulderers, sport climbers, and overhanging aficionados. The Genius gains its high performance through a No-Edge technology rubber overlay over the toe, which grips on edges and make-believe footholds like they were ledges. This remarkable technology lets you place your feet quicker and more efficiently, without having to readjust because No-Edge feels that good on the first step. The Genius also features La Sportiva's mind-bending P3 technology that made the Solution one of the most popular shoes today. P3 uses a Permanent Power Platform to maintain the Genius' aggressive downturn for life. Like the Testarossa, the Genius' heel is surprisingly soft, stretchy, and sensitive for a proper fit as well as solid heel-hooking.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva TC Pro Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: La Sportiva's TC Pro Climbing Shoe has been remastered by two big wall legends, bringing even more endurance performance to our multi-pitch missions. The narrowed medial webbing increases foot-jam comfort, while the revamped rand boosts durability and grip through long crack systems. When we venture onto the face, the full sole's stiffer rubber supports us on credit card edges, and the medium-high asymmetry gives us precision and power on near non-existent holds.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Katana Lace Vibram XS Edge Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: For routes that give us a little bit of everything, we kit up with La Sportiva's Katana Lace Vibram XS Edge Climbing Shoe. The medium midsole gives us the flexibility to cruise slab, the firm rubber gives us edging support on the face, while the moderate downturn keeps our footwork precise and powerful while pulling the roof.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Otaki Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: The Otaki Climbing Shoe is an updated version of La Sportiva's very versatile Katana, except with a downturn for a more aggressive performance on any route or problem, and it's among our favorites for precise performance. P3 technology applies a Permanent Power Platform that ensures the Otaki's downturn stays downturned. The S-Heel construction optimizes heel hooking and gives a snug fit, while Vibram's XS Edge sole sharpens the sides for ideal edging, slicing, and dicing. La Sportiva styled the Otaki's upper with laser-cut leather and microfiber reinforcements to reduce stretch. The LaspoFlex midsole isn't too soft nor too stiff; you could say it's just right.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Otaki Climbing Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Women's Otaki Climbing Shoe is an updated version of La Sportiva's versatile Katana, upgraded with a sharper downturn for more aggressive performance on any route or problem. P3 technology applies a Permanent Power Platform that ensures the Otaki's downturn stays downturned. The S-Heel construction optimizes heel hooking and gives a snug fit, while Vibram's XS Grip2 sole sharpens the sides for ideal edging, slicing, and dicing. La Sportiva styled the Otaki's upper with laser-cut leather and microfiber reinforcements to reduce stretch. The LaspoFlex midsole isn't too soft nor too stiff; you could say it's just right.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Spire GTX Hiking Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: When we feel the need for speed, the Spire GTX Hiking Shoe gets us moving in no time. Inspired by a combination of trail running technology and La Sportiva's mountain DNA roots, this low-profile hiking shoe is designed for hikers that move with speedy efficiency through their favorite alpine trails and winding forest paths.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Skwama Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: Here to help us take it to the next level, the Skwama Climbing Shoe is La Sportiva's high-performance slipper for competition bouldering and technical sport climbing. P3 technology applies a Permanent Power Platform that ensures the Skwama's downturn stays downturned. The S-Heel construction optimizes heel hooking and gives a snug fit, while Vibram's Grip2 sole offers high sensitivity, so you can feel what's underfoot. This shoe's soft LaspoFlex midsole gives enhanced sensitivity, a better feel, and more control on microscopic jibs and technical, insecure moves. La Sportiva styled the Skwama's upper with laser-cut leather and microfiber reinforcements that reduce stretch.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Ascent Primaloft Jacket - Men's
Product.Long_Description: When it comes to high-output adventures like touring the backcountry or hiking to a new climbing spot, the La Sportiva Ascent Primaloft Jacket is a vital part of our winter activities. It features a lightweight, warm construction with the combination of Primaloft Silver Eco insulation and Vapovent technology, while the stretch fabric on the sides and sleeves provides optimal freedom of movement. There is also a wide variety of pocket space with a zippered chest pocket, two invisible zipper pockets, and an added storage pocket to keep our gear safe and secure.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Miura VS Climbing Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: When making a redpoint attempt, we pull on our sending shoe, the La Sportiva Miura VS Climbing Shoe. The slingshot rand and P3 system work together to retain the aggressive profile and keep power driving to the toe. Now featuring a narrower heel, this sender hooks onto micro holds at first throw, while the updated closure system boasts hardwearing TPU overlays to resist tears when strapping in tight or blindly searching for a toe hook. La Sportiva didn't touch the sole, so we still get the reliable bite of Vibram XS Grip 2 rubber.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Solution Climbing Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Women's Solution Climbing Shoe is La Sportiva's most popular answer to difficult boulder problems and steep sport routes. Drastically downturned, this shoe is one of the best for overhangs, scummy heel hooks, greasy smears, and microscopic edges. La Sportiva's revered P3 Power Platform was first developed specifically for this shoe, and it retains the shoe's aggressive downturn for the shoe's life. A shoe this technical deserves its own special rubber compound, and it's one of the few out there to feature Vibram's XS Grip2 rubber, which is extremely stiff around the toe box and soft, supple, and thin at the heel and arch. With more flexibility at the heel, the Solution bends to your will when you're toeing off-angled footholds and high-stepping the top-out.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Skwama Vegan Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: The Skwama Vegan Climbing Shoe follows in the footsteps of the OG Skwama, while implementing the technology of cruelty-free material. We love how responsively grippy this shoe is during gym and outdoor sessions, on boulders or while tied in.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Skwama Vegan Climbing Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Skwama Vegan Climbing Shoe features everything we know and appreciate about La Sportiva's OG Skwama, but this version features an even more breathable insole that's made with synthetic materials for cruelty-free performance.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Jackal GTX Trail Running Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The original Jackal impressed ultra-runners with superior cushioning and stability suitable for long miles over rough, technical trails. La Sportiva not only added reliable waterproofing to the Women's Jackal GTX Trail Running Shoe, but also made sure the waterproofing didn't interfere with the shoe's ultra-worthy performance. Gore-Tex Invisible Fit is a newer type of waterproofing from Gore-Tex. It's the thinnest, lightest membrane that Gore-Tex currently makes, and while it's still dependably waterproof when you're running in the rain, it's also remarkably flexible and breathable once you're back in the sun.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Miura Lace Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: Sometimes there aren't as many footholds as we'd like; other times there are fewer than that. The La Sportiva Miura Lace Climbing Shoe has a technical advantage so we can get creative with our footwork. Its Vibram XS Edge can either crimp greasy micro-edges or something smaller, less-greasy off to the side. The Miura sports a moderate downturn ideal for both vertical and overhung climbs, and the aggressive asymmetry directs all the power directly to the toe for a precise performance. La Sportiva made the upper out of an 8-panel leather that stretches in key areas to conform to your foot's shape, and the slingshot rand around the heel helps the shoe keep an aggressive performance for a long time.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Miura Climbing Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Miura Climbing Shoe sticks to the most crimp-tastic routes and edges wart-sized footholds. Its high curvature and downturned toe give you more friction on the smallest holds or smears with the sticky help of Vibram XS Grip2 rubber. Shaped forefoot edges let you rest on tiny ledges between overhanging pitches, while the LaspoFlex forefoot midsole provides comfort during belays and longer routes. A synthetic Dentex lining prevents the leather upper from stretching, drastically reducing the necessary break-in time.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva TX Hike Mid GTX Hiking Boot - Women's
Product.Long_Description: We can take on any trail with comfort when in the TX Hike Mid GTX Hiking Boot. It offers greater bracing around our ankles to stop us from calling it quits if we slip between some rocks. And like any great boot, the TX features a waterproof and breathable GORE-TEX membrane and high-traction Vibram outsole to give us the best hiking performance.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva TX Hike Mid GTX Hiking Boot - Men's
Product.Long_Description: We've got a lot of ground to cover-and it's not easy ground either. So we need the control and comfort offered by La Sportiva's TX Hike Mid GTX Hiking Boot. It has a specialized midsole that levels our ride by stiffening the side-to-side flex without sacrificing the comfortable cushioning it offers. Plus, its GORE-TEX membrane lends loads of aeration and waterproofing so our feet stay fresh on the journey up those jagged peaks while a Vibram Mega Grip outsole clasps our feet to the ground like magnets on metal.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Bushido II GTX Trail Running Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Off-camber terrain is a breeze with the Bushido II GTX Trail Running Shoe. It's built to tackle the technical stuff, and we like how responsive it is when we're bounding up scree fields and scrambling across ridgelines. A slip-on construction wraps our foot like a sock, and an updated heel design enhances fit and feel for comfort.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Cyklon Trail Running Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: We make sure to always hit podium when we're running the gauntlet with the Cyklon Trail Running Shoe, even if it's only ourselves we're racing against. With a variety of tech to support and steady our feet, we're worried less about twisted ankles stopping the clock. Toss in La Sportiva's versatile FriXion outsole, and we're ready for whatever the trail throws our way.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Cyklon Trail Running Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Reflecting on all the sweat and tears shed on countless downhill repeats and miles of technical trail, we step into La Sportiva's Cyklon Trail Running Shoe for the day we have been training for. With our feet secured in their fortress, we storm the course with energy, bounding straight for the clouds as we push for our first sky race win to make all that time spent in the pain cave worth it.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Bushido II GTX Trail Running Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Take on technical trails in leaps and bounds with the Bushido II GTX Trail Running Shoe. With this shoe, we're running ridgelines and scrambling up scree fields because that's what it's built to do. It's responsive and stable with durable protection and outstanding traction that keeps us firmly rooted to the trails and rocks we're scurrying across.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Wildcat 2.0 GTX Trail Running Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Tip-toeing around puddles was never your style, and now that you have the La Sportiva Women's Wildcat 2. 0 GTX Trail Running Shoe you're free as a bird to express your love for getting down and dirty. With a stretchy Gore-Tex waterproof, breathable lining and moisture-wicking AirMesh upper, your foot will stay cool and dry as you run with muddy abandon. An aggressive sticky FriXion AT rubber sole grabs onto slick rock and wet pavement for secure and speedy work.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Ikarus Pant - Men's
Product.Long_Description: With a technical mix of fabrics, the Ikarus Pant is versatile and ready for the day, whether it be high anaerobic activities, ski touring or bigger alpine objectives.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Ultra Raptor II Trail Running Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Mud, rocks, roots: The Ultra Raptor II eats it all. The light and sticky rubber bites hard into any surface it encounters, boosting our confidence as we bound across varying terrain. As we near that triple-digit mileage, the full-length rock guard and lively foam protect our soles and pace from our heavy, tired strides.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Kaptiva Trail Running Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: With the La Sportiva Kaptiva Trail Running Shoe you can navigate technical terrain with ease, even when you're cruising down the trail at higher speeds. It was designed to give you a precise fit, stability for uneven terrain, and underfoot grip that'll keep your footing secure on any trail surface. It starts with a slip-on construction that features a knit wraparound tongue and a Trust-Fit shape that'll give you a snug and secure fit to prevent your shoe from sliding around when you're darting over roots and rocks. A supportive midsole offers stability and protection thanks to torsion-resistant inserts and an EVA rock plate, so you can run without worry on uneven or rocky trails. On the outsole there's a grippy rubber compound that won't slip out on steep surfaces, while an Impact Brake System and a complete set of lugs ensures that you'll be able to dig into the trail whether you're grinding your way up or cruising on down. Customer feedback suggests this shoe runs small, we would suggest sizing up if you are unused to a tight performance fit.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Kaptiva Trail Running Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Kaptiva Trail Running Shoe is designed with a precise and comfortable fit for your technical trail runs. Its Trust-Fit shape cradles your foot and reduces slippage while the Sock-Like Compression upper ensures a precise fit for confident control during your runs. The MEMlex midsole cushions each step while a 1. 5mm dual-density EVA Rock-Guard in the midsole and a TPU toe cap help keep your feet protected as you tackle rugged terrain. Additionally, STB control inserts provide you with torsional stability across technical trails and the FriXion soles ensure reliable traction across the varying terrain you encounter throughout your runs in the mountains.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Jackal II Trail Running Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Now with deeper lugs and a breezier upper, the La Sportiva Jackal II Trail Running Shoe is lighter and more ravenous than ever before. The new recycled mesh, revamped heel fit, and redesigned lacing reduce weight while boosting breathability and volume versatility for the most comfortable fit through our double- and triple-digit miles. The seamless reinforcements dismiss thorny brush and keep friction low, and the beefy lugs underfoot eat up dirt, rocks, and mud to keep our strikes solid and our toe-offs powerful.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Jackal II Trail Running Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Burly yet light, the La Sportiva Jackal II Trail Running Shoe keeps us moving quick on trail through double-digit miles. The dual-density platform softens and stabilizes our stride as we bound along rooted, rocky singletrack. Equipped with mesh inserts and a full-length rock guard, this pair gives our feet added airflow and protection, while the higher volume fit allows room for that long-run swell. La Sportiva sourced recycled materials for this iteration of the Jackal to lessen the environmental impact of our strides.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Kubo Climbing Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: We pull on the Kubo Climbing Shoe for flashing routes on the lead wall and topping out in the boulder room. The toe rubber integrates into the toe edge for greater hooking performance and increased durability. These entry-to-mid-level shoes are so comfortable that we don't even take them off between sends.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Descender Storm Jacket - Men's
Product.Long_Description: From skintrack to icefall to summit, the La Sportiva Descender Storm Jacket gives us that touch of wet-weather warmth we need to keep pushing. We move freely inside the stretch construction, while the soft-brushed fleece interior wicks away sweat and holds in heat. Should fresh flakes or ice crumbles dust our shoulders, the treated fibers stop them from soaking through.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva TX2 Evo Approach Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The TX2 Evo Approach Shoe from La Sportiva is a light and soft shoe to get us to the climb in comfort. The synthetic mesh upper ventilates out moisture and easily drains water if rain happens to run our way. We find it to be supportive and high-traction thanks to its reinforced midsole and specialized Vibram Idogrip outsole.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Helios III Trail Running Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: When we think about La Sportiva, we're thinking about the small mountain village in the heart of the Italian Dolomites where the brand's factory is located. Their tradition and heritage shine in their products, and we've seen this brand produce quality gear, whether it be climbing shoes, trail runners, or the like. With the Helios III Trail Running Shoe, it's clear La Sportiva designed it for running the jagged limestone peaks and glaciated valleys of its heritage. It's a third-generation re-design on the prevailing Helios model, and it's got everything you would need in an ultralight, cushioned trail shoe. This low profile, yet durable design is perfect for everything from trails to ridgelines, and runners will see the shoe is as versatile as the brand that designed it. Breathability, comfort, and cushion are all on point here, and we love to see the low profile design with that toe cap for additional protection.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Bushido II Trail Running Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Designed for serious runners taking on technical terrain, the La Sportiva Bushido II Trail Running shoe has a well-regarded reputation in our office for a reason. This newest iteration aligns with the mentality of "improve it, but don't mess with what makes it loved." You can expect the same low-volume performance fit, same drop, same low weight, same snug fit, and same outsole rubber and lug pattern. The most noticeable update to the Bushido is the midsole construction. La Sportiva added their proprietary LaSpEVA in an effort to create a more responsive and springier ride to keep you comfortable through longer distances. Additionally, the upper has been updated with a more breathable mesh fabric that still retains the same durability of its predecessor so you can confidently tackle rugged terrain through the mountains.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Karacal Trail Running Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: For pre-race training and post-race recovery, the Karacal is our shoe. With its high-volume build making room for that long mileage swell and its supple upper welcoming cool ridgeline winds, this trail eater delivers optimal comfort and breathability from 30K to 70K.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Jackal Trail Running Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Designed to meet the demands of ultra-runners, this shoe has both the cushioning we need to go the distance and the traction and stability required for rugged terrain. In addition to a beefier midsole that attenuates shock and delivers comfort for all-day races, this shoe's got several stabilizing features for the trail, including an inner rock plate and PU inserts in the midsole. Meanwhile, high-traction rubber on the outsole keeps your footing secure on steep mountain trails. Customer feedback suggests this shoe runs small, we would suggest sizing up if you are unused to a tight performance fit.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Cobra Eco Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: La Sportiva's Cobra Eco Climbing Shoe offers the same aggressive performance as the long-lasted Cobra Climbing Shoe, except this model comes in an eco-friendlier fashion. In fact, 85% of all materials are recycled to lower the impact on the environment. The biodegradable leather upper undergoes a metal-free, eco-tanning process to offer the same stretch and feel as the original Cobra, and Frixion Eco sole comes from recycling the same rubber used in La Sportiva's standard production for shoes like the original Cobra. The result is the same aggressive performance as the Cobra when you're climbing overhung routes and problems.
