Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Machina Pant - Men's
Product.Long_Description: We pull on the La Sportiva Machina Pant when we're spending a day in the vertical world, battling for a send pitch after pitch. The articulated knees, gusseted crotch, and high-stretch upper back insert let us stem and drop-knee freely, while the abrasion-resistant front panels hold strong against sharp limestone. With the waist and hem cinched tight, we get a fit that stays put and out of our way as we toe down on tiny chips.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Cosmic Hoodie - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Attention to detail and to the environment for this versatile second layer. The brushed inside of our Techstretch PRO II Fabric, made of recycled and natural fibres, provide warmth and comfort while helping towards the reduction of micro-shedding.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Free Touring Mitten
Product.Long_Description: La Sportiva's Free Touring mitten provides the warmth and mobility we need to make the most of our mountain time. The inside mitt includes individual finger linings filled with Primaloft to maximize our warmth while the outside features goat leather for waterproofing, grip, and durability.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Method Hoodie - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The Method Hoodie features a polyester material made in part from recycled plastic bottles, creating a functional and sustainable midlayer for added warmth on laid-back and active days alike. A Polygiene StayFresh antibacterial treatment eliminates odor build-up and the need for excess washing, keeping this jacket fresh and hygienic for long-wearing use.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Upendo Hooded Fleece Jacket - Men's
Product.Long_Description: A lightweight thermal jacket made with our Techstretch Light fleece. The tridimensional structure of the fabric and its lightweightness give to this style improved breathability and comfort. The soft hood and zippered hand pockets add versatility and storage possibility.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Mantra Pant - Women's
Product.Long_Description: When we're focused on a tricky hold, the last thing we want to worry about is our attire slipping or restricting movement. With its generous waistband and stretchy jogger design, La Sportiva's Mantra Pant allows movement where you need it most while keeping everything secure on your climb.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Setter Pant - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Setter Pant is designed to keep you warm while climbing hard in cold winter temperatures. Made from soft corduroy, you'll stay warm and comfortable while working your project. Enjoy a women's-specific fit while still maintaining the freedom of movement you need.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Method Hoodie - Women's
Product.Long_Description: A perfect combination of style and performance, the Method Hoody is made from a lightweight recycled fabric mix designed to reduce plastic microshedding. An elastic hem and Polygiene(R) treatment help to keep you cozy from the crag to your couch.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Setter Pant - Men's
Product.Long_Description: When temps drop and friction is at its best, we pull on the La Sportiva Setter Pant and head out to our project. The soft corduroy material offers us a bit of warmth, while the touch of stretch and gusseted crotch give us full send freedom.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Talus Pant - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Long approach. Winding route. Campsite lounging. The Talus keeps us moving free and feeling good through it all. We high step and stem with ease in the articulated construction and stretchy fibers, while the rear loop keeps our chalk bag at the ready for a little powder courage before the crux. With a plush feel interior, this pant matches that post-send, flask-passing, campfire-basking vibe.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Rambler Flannel Shirt - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Rambler Flannel Shirt is a staple piece that blends rugged durability with everyday comfort, making it perfect for everything from mountain adventures to evenings around town. Crafted from a blend of recycled and natural fibers, this flannel shirt is as sustainable as it is stylish. Thoughtful details like a lockable chest pocket, adjustable sleeves, and a French collar give it a classic look with practical features that make it ideal for active wear. With its timeless style and eco-friendly construction, the Rambler Flannel Shirt is a reliable companion for any adventure.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Ski Touring Glove
Product.Long_Description: Built for the rigors of backcountry tours, the La Sportiva Ski Touring Glove offers the perfect blend of warmth, waterproofing and dexterity. Built with a durable softshell that allows our hands to move freely, the gloves are reinforced with leather on the palm, thumb, and index finger for increased toughness. PrimaLoft Gold insulation in the back of the hand provides lightweight, low-profile warmth and comfort, and the minimal front-of-hand insulation keeps our palms toasty while we ski and climb.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Mantra Short - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Mantra Short is an easy choice when our day consists of crushing our project at the sport crag. Its stretchy yet durable material moves with us, draw to draw without inhibiting our high feet, heel hooks, and dynamic reaches.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Belay 12In Short - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Made sustainably with partly recycled materials, the Belay 12nn Short is long enough to keep us covered when we're knee-scumming our way up a route. The 4-way stretch construction fits comfortably under our harness while we're running up a chimney.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Nomad Shirt - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The technical fibre blend we selected to realise the new Nomad Shirt is made with recycled polyester and Kapok. The right amount of stretch to follow your moves and optimal moisture management. Your next favourite climbing shirt!The technical fibre blend we selected to realise the new Nomad Shirt is made with recycled polyester and Kapok. The right amount of stretch to follow your moves and optimal moisture management. Your next favourite climbing shirt!

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Tundra Pant - Women's
Product.Long_Description: La Sportiva combines its mountain expertise and stylish construction to craft the Tundra Pant for cool, dry climbing climates. Cotton threads are tough enough for the crag, and their organic growth is easy on the planet. Pre-shaped knees, stretch fabric, and an elastic waist give us freedom of movement for tricky routes.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Roots Pant - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Giving your arms the proper credit, you won't get too far into your climb without the right footholds, and you won't be able to nail those footholds in just any old pair of pants. The La Sportiva Roots Pants give you the mobility you need to get your feet set on the most difficult moves, and the durability you need to not shy away from rugged rock walls and boulders. They're made with a durable organic cotton blend that won't rip or tear at the first sign of real rock, and also boast a roomy fit and light stretch to give you easier movement when you're trying to get those feet around. A gusseted crotch aids in further mobility while also preventing blowouts, and a stretchy elastic waistband ensures that you've always got the most comfortable fit possible.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Tour Long-Sleeve Shirt - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Dedicated to active winter activities, this eco-friendly baselayer is soft and stretchy. Ideal for layering or as a stand-alone shirt in autumn and spring thanks to the functional reflective details.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Timing Short - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Timing Short offers lightweight and minimalist design without compromising technical features. A small storage pocket holds necessities while an inner drawstring keeps the Timing Shorts where you want them. A wicking finish keeps sweat away from your skin so you stay dry and comfortable. Treated with Polygiene anti-bacterial and anti-odor fabric treatment so you stay fresh for longer. Made with a mix of recycled polyester and Bluesign approved fabric.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Esquirol Short - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Hot days spent bouldering with friends are some of the best of the year. To make sure we can enjoy them we reach for the La Sportiva Esquirol Short. These shorts pair a stretchy and breathable organic cotton construction with a comfortable elastic waistband, and the extra movement of a crotch gusset to make sure we can move freely.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Comp Short - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Comp Short - Men's

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Escape Short - Women's
Product.Long_Description: When dancing up walls the sun seems to favor, we do so in La Sportiva's Escape Short. The low-profile waist sits comfortably under our harness, while the gusseted crotch and touch of stretch let us heel hook and stem freely.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Dimension T-Shirt - Men's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"The Dimension T-Shirt is my go-to for gym workouts and trail runs. It's lightweight, breathable, and dries super quickly, making it ideal for high-output activities. The Repreve(R) recycled polyester feels soft and performs great, while the Polygiene(R) anti-odor treatment keeps it fresh even after tough sessions. Whether lifting weights or crushing a hike, this tee delivers comfort and sustainability in one package."Push your limits in the Dimension T-Shirt, designed for athletes who demand performance without compromising on comfort. Made with a blend of recycled polyester and cotton, this training essential wicks moisture, dries fast, and keeps you cool when the intensity rises. The relaxed fit moves with you, while Polygiene(R) anti-odor technology ensures freshness through every workout. Feel good about your impact on the planet while staying comfortable during your toughest sessions. Featuring Repreve(R) recycled plastic bottle fabric, the Dimension T-Shirt offers an eco-conscious approach to performance apparel. Whether you're logging miles, lifting weights, or stretching out after a long day, this versatile tee is built to keep up.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Joya Short - Women's
Product.Long_Description: When we want something easy and breezy for our warm-weather bouldering session, we reach for La Sportiva's Joya Short. Airy yet durable cotton with a hint of stretch keeps us feeling light and moving freely while we perfect new lines.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Dimension T-Shirt - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The lightweight Dimension T-Shirt sports a relaxed cropped fit and is made in part with recycled plastic bottles, bringing active-friendly style and sustainability to our indoor climbing sessions or hikes.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Comp Tank Top - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Function meets a cool look on the new Charm Tank. Developed for your training sessions, it is a soft, lightweight and breathable tank.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Dude Tank Top - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The Dude Tank gives us those laidback vibes to stay cool and collected while dialing in beta. Built with buttery organic fibers and La Sportiva's iconic color-blocking, this top feels good and looks good, keeping the stoke stoked from project to pub.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Twist Tank Top - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Twist Tank, designed for active use on the climbing wall, provides comfort and a good feeling on the skin thanks to the soft touch of organic cotton. This iconic tank is thoroughly well-refined and a striking new design gives the final touch.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Flat Hat
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Flat Hat combines clean lines with a laid-back style that's perfect for any post-pursuit hangout. We appreciate the eco-friendly construction of recycled polyester, which feels good on the head and even better for the planet. The adjustable back ensures a comfortable fit whether we're keeping the sun off our face at the crag or just kicking back at the trailhead. With its simple patch logo, this hat brings classic La Sportiva style to every adventure.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Terry Beanie - Women's
Product.Long_Description: When the cold bites, the Women's Terry Beanie keeps us feeling cozy and looking stylish. The chunky knit design traps warmth while adding classic texture to our winter wardrobe, whether we're strolling downtown or heading up the hill. Made from soft, synthetic fabric, it feels comfortable against our skin, and the fun pom-pom on top gives a nod to carefree winter days. Lightweight and easy to pack, it's our go-to for everyday adventures when warmth and style are both a must.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Knitty Headband
Product.Long_Description: Knitty Headband

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Jackal II GTX Trail Running Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Built for distance, the La Sportiva Jackal II GTX Trail Running Shoe keeps our feet feeling good from first mile to last. The redesigned upper-including a lighter tongue, new heel construction, mesh inserts, and refined lacing structure-reduces gram count while maximizing comfort with a fit that better adapts to long-run swell and invites more mountain breezes to flow through. Rain or shine, the GORE-TEX lining keeps our feet comfortably dry by keeping water out and letting our own vapor escape. As we stride, the lightweight foam softens the ground, the forefoot and heel inserts stabilize our strikes and toe-offs, and the full-length rock guard and TPU toe cap shield our soles and toes from bruising.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva TX3 Approach Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Guide books have a way of making the approach sound pretty straightforward, but after multiple creek crossings, backtracking, and sketchy scrambles, we're glad to have prepared for the unexpected by lacing up the La Sportiva TX3 Approach Shoes. With a quick-drying polyester mesh upper, protective rubber rand, and super-sticky Vibram rubber sole, the TX3 is a veritable all-terrain crusher with the chops to tackle just about any rocky surface you encounter. La Sportiva pulled out all the stops with this one by adding a torsionally rigid STB system, MEMlex underfoot cushioning, and non-slip mesh lining for a cool, comfortable, and secure fit for the approach.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Alien 1.0 Alpine Touring Boot - 2025
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Alien 1. 0 Alpine Touring Boot is a true must-have for dedicated skimo and touring enthusiasts. The Carbon Grilamid LFT shell and cuff are as light and stiff as can be, saving our legs on the skin track before we go full tilt down steep chutes or massive trophy lines for the fast way down. The Alien 1. 0 can get us anywhere on the mountain, offering unparalleled traction when we have to clip out of our skis so we can get over icy boulder fields. The highlight of the boot is the micro-adjustable BOA fit system that allows us to find a secure fit that eliminates dead spots and pressure points for maximum comfort and performance.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa 4-Quattro Pro Alpine Touring Boot - 2025
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa 4-Quattro Pro Alpine Touring Boot combines lightweight design with powerful performance, making it ideal for both the resort and the backcountry. With a 60deg range of motion in walk mode, we glide up the skin track with ease, while the Secure Speedlock 4 system keeps us locked in and confident on the descent. The Pebax(R) Rnew(R) shell and Intuition(R) Pro Flex Ride liner provide a snug, responsive fit that balances comfort and control. Whether we're chasing powder in the backcountry or carving steep lines at the resort, this boot delivers the precision and power we need to ski our best.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Maestrale RS Alpine Touring Boot - 2025 - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Designed by and for avid backcountry chargers, the Scarpa Maestrale RS Alpine Touring Boot offers an impressive balance of uphill comfort and downhill performance. To limit compromise, these boots offer a burly Speed Lock MLT walk mode that locks in 60 degrees of motion for effortless strides on the skintrack, an alpine-influenced 125 flex that drives power to our skis on the descent, and a thermo-moldable Pro Flex Performance liner that eliminates rubbing and blistering on the uphill while locking our heel in the pocket on the downhill.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Gea RS Alpine Touring Boot - 2025 - Women's
Product.Long_Description: When accessing and slashing fresh powder tucked away deep in the backcountry, we wear the Scarpa Gea RS Alpine Touring Boot. This boot is feature packed without weighing a ton for top backcountry performance that won't slow us down on the approach. The three-buckle design features Scarpa's Wave Closure System that reduces weight without sacrificing strength and security. On bootpack sections, the walk mode's 61-degrees of motion and the sole's Vibram rubber let us take long, confident strides. And as we revel in steep lines and soft turns, the very stiff flex helps harness our power.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa F1 LT Alpine Touring Boot - 2025
Product.Long_Description: The F1 LT Alpine Touring Boot is Scarpa's lightest ski boot that best-suits ski mountaineers and high-mileage backcountry tours. Carbon-infused Grilamid grants a forgiving 100 flex at a ridiculously low weight of two pounds and two ounces. Scarpa's 3D Lambda Torsion Frame maintains flex throughout the boot for enhances downhill performance. On the ascent, the boot's Speed Lock latch initiates an impressive range of motion for easy hiking. At the summit, a single buckle and the BOA Fit System's glove-friendly dial help you transition quickly. The ultralight, ultra-breathable liner has a waterproof gaiter to keep comfortably dry when you're setting the skin track through deep powder.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa F1 LT Alpine Touring Boot - 2025 - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The F1 LT Alpine Touring Boot is Scarpa's lightest ski boot that best-suits ski mountaineers and high-mileage backcountry tours. Carbon-infused Grilamid grants a forgiving 100 flex at a ridiculously low weight of two pounds and two ounces. Scarpa's 3D Lambda Torsion Frame maintains flex throughout the boot for enhances downhill performance. On the ascent, the boot's Speed Lock latch initiates an impressive range of motion for easy hiking. At the summit, a single buckle and Boa's glove-friendly dial help you transition quickly. The ultralight, ultra-breathable liner has a waterproof gaiter to keep comfortably dry when you're setting the skin track through deep powder. Although the brand's size chart has recommendations for how to choose your size, customer feedback suggests this shoe runs small, we would suggest sizing up if you are unused to a tight performance fit.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Maestrale XT Alpine Touring Boot - 2023
Product.Long_Description: Scarpa's Maestrale XT Ski Boot is our maestro for conducting rhythmic wiggles across the backcountry. It's the best baton for master conductors creating art down snowy summits. We love its smooth, progressive 130+ flex that offers the performance needed for aggressive descents, and a carbon-infused construction keeps the boot's weight low for comfy ascents. A roomy 101mm last and thermo-moldable liner further enhances uphill comfort, and the walk mode maintains an excellent range of motion. Underfoot, Vibram's rubber sole mixes with Scarpa's TOP85 compound for greater durability that doesn't inhibit overall traction. This is the boot to conquer icy, rocky summits as well as float deep powder somewhere in the trees.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa F1 XT Alpine Touring Boot
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa F1 XT Alpine Touring Boot is an efficient uphill boot for avid backcountry skiers and ski mountaineers. These boots help you cut a new skin track and reach tricky ridges with a super-lightweight Grilamid construction, overlap shield tech design that keeps snow out of our socks, and a Seed Lock LT walk mode that provides friction free movement. Although the brand's size chart has recommendations for how to choose your size, customer feedback suggests this shoe runs small, we would suggest sizing up if you are unused to a tight performance fit.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa 4-Quattro XT Alpine Touring Boot
Product.Long_Description: Scarpa designed the 4-Quattro XT Alpine Touring Boot to thrive on both the uphill and downhill inside and outside of the resort. We have found that boots like this always have to make a concession in some departments, but we couldn't find one. The Grilamid construction not only offers torsional rigidity and a reliable flex but it also skips the use of petroleum products. Additionally, the 100m last balances uphill and downhill performance nicely, while the durable walk mode lever ensures we can stride naturally up the skin track.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa 4-Quattro XT Alpine Touring Boot - 2025 - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Catered to backcountry skiers who like to do it all, the Scarpa 4-Quattro XT Alpine Touring Boot has your back on the steepest terrain whether you are accessing it via lift or legs. We like how these boots look and feel like a backcountry touring boot when wee need them too, but offer 4 aluminum buckles and a GripWalk sole for when the resort comes calling. The 115 flex drives our ski through resort chop or untouched pow, while the 100mm last delicately balances comfort and warmth with a slop-free powerful fit.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Gea Alpine Touring Boot - 2025 - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The best backcountry lines are often far away from the trailhead, to get there we rock the Scarpa Gea Alpine Touring Boot. These touring boots combine a cozy 102mm last with heel retention straps that eliminate rubbing, and a 61deg range of motion walk mode to help us stroll up any skin track we can find. Toss in the lightweight yet powerful Pebax shell construction and controllable 100 flex and we have a boot we can trust to get us there and get us down with enough energy to do it all again.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Maestrale Alpine Touring Boot - 2025 - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Back for another year, this iteration of the Scarpa Maestrale Alpine Touring Boot offers more uphill speed than ever before, yet it maintains the backcountry control it is known for. The uphill speed is created by the Pebax Rnew shell with carbon reinforcement in the lower boot and the 61deg range of motion provided by the burly walk mode lever. On the downhill, the 110 flex allows us to drive our skis with minimal energy loss, the Pro Flex Touring liner molds to our feet to lock our heels in place, and the 16deg of forward lean creates a traditional alpine stance that we can trust in spicy situations.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa F1 GT Alpine Touring Boot - 2024 - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The standard-setting benchmark for lightweight touring performance, the F1 features a responsive, laterally stiff design and incredible range of motion, as well as an Intuition liner, integrated RECCO reflector and new tongue alignment extension on the shell. Although the brand's size chart has recommendations for how to choose your size, customer feedback suggests this shoe runs small, we would suggest sizing up if you are unused to a tight performance fit.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Gea RS Alpine Touring Boot - 2023 - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Gea RS Alpine Touring Boot is positioned in Scarpa's line as the top dog for no-compromise skiers looking to log serious vert and shred technical lines in style. The 120 flex is the stiffest in Scarpa's line for the reliable downhill performance we need in varied conditions, and the Speed Lock XT walk mode offers a staggering 60-degree range of motion-effectively blowing the competition out of the water.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa F1 Alpine Touring Boot - 2025 - Women's
Product.Long_Description: With lightweight touring performance that others may measure themselves against, the F1 Alpine Touring Boot is just the ticket we need to tackle long slogs, steep ascents, and any terrain we point our tips at when it's time to descend. Its responsive, laterally stiff design can be accredited to its construction from strong, lightweight Grilamid with an over-injected carbon insert to further stiffen the boot and improve the overall power transmission and responsiveness to the ski. Inside the shell, the updated, women-specific Intuition liner is sculpted at the cuff to aptly accommodate the shape of our calves, and can be fully thermo-molded for a blend of performance fit and comfort. The collar strap boasts integrated RECCO technology, a search system that's widely used by mountain rescue in emergencies, and a Vibram UFO EVO sole offers dependable traction on rocky terrain or icy bootpacks.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa F1 Alpine Touring Boot - 2025
Product.Long_Description: Everything about the Scarpa F1 Alpine Touring Boot encourages swift skiing and skinning through the backcountry and beyond. Its Grilamid construction includes Scarpa's Carbon Core for enhanced rigidity at a ridiculously low weight, and while you won't feel heavy-footed on the ascent, you'll also feel light and nimble on the descent with a moderate 95 flex. A wide last gives a roomy space for your foot stay comfy on extremely long tours, and the Intuition Pro Flex Evo liner is heat-moldable for a custom fit for even greater comfort. Scarpa updates this year's model with a Carbon Core Evo backbone that ensures a consistent 95 flex. Unlike walk modes with flimsy pins, the F1's burly latch also maintains a consistent flex for a long-lasting performance. Although the brand's size chart has recommendations for how to choose your size, customer feedback suggests this shoe runs small, we would suggest sizing up if you are unused to a tight performance fit.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa 4-Quattro SL Alpine Touring Boot - 2025
Product.Long_Description: "Hybrid" boots are going nowhere and it is in large part due to boots like the Scarpa 4-Quattro SL Alpine Touring Boot. This boot takes a trusted 2-piece, 4-buckle design that boasts a 120 flex that is at the top of the power and stiffness category. We really like how they took this trusted design and slapped a versatile combination of a Gripwalk sole and tech inserts that let us trust these at the resort and in the backcountry.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Alien Alpine Touring Boot - 2025
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Alien Alpine Touring Boot splits the difference between full-blown rando racing boot and hardcore tourer, with a carbon-infused Grilamid shell and cuff that are plenty light enough to crush the skin track while still handling their business on steep faces and in shotgun couloirs. The Alien's most distinguishing feature is the fit. Not many boots can boast a micro-adjustable BOA closure system, but the Alien uses it to secure the foot smoothly and evenly, completely eliminating pressure points and dead spots.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Gea Alpine Touring Boot - 2023 - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Gea Alpine Touring Boot boasts all of the performance-oriented features of the RS version, in a 100 flex for skiers who are either smaller in stature or lighter on their feet. This model fits into the line as a no-compromise boot for skiers looking to push their limits in the mountains both while ascending and descending. We appreciate the adjustable lean angle that helps us dial in the perfect fit, and the Speed Lock XT walk mode offers a staggering 60-degree range of motion-effectively blowing the competition out of the water.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Maestrale Alpine Touring Boot - 2023
Product.Long_Description: The Maestrale Alpine Touring Boot fits into the Scarpa line as a rational option for the vast majority of backcountry skiers thanks to its balanced construction. On the one hand, it features a 110 flex and an adjustable lean angle to help us dial in the downhill performance that the Maestrale line is known for. On the other hand, the user-friendly walk mode and comfort-oriented 101mm last supply us with uphill performance for lengthy ski touring routes in technical terrain.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa T2 Eco Telemark Boot - 2025
Product.Long_Description: Anyone who loves the backcountry-the untouched, glistening pow and sound of silence-will appreciate the environmentally conscious Scarpa T2 Eco Telemark Boot. Made of organic and renewable yet high-performing Pebax Rnew, this boot is a planet-loving powerhouse. Add to that its triple-density lateral stability and incredibly comfy Intuition performance liner, and you have serious climbing, ripping, and all-day-wearing tele boot.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa T2 Eco Telemark Boot - 2025 - Women's
Product.Long_Description: If you love a wide-open vista full of pristine bowls and undisturbed glades, you'll embrace the resource-conscious Scarpa Women's T2 Eco Telemark Boot, which is made from organic, plant-based Pebax Rnew plastic. Thanks to the T2's triple-density, uber-stable construction, there's more to love about this versatile all-terrain boot than its reduced carbon footprint. The last and cuff are designed with the female foot in mind, and it features a narrow heel, lower calf, and higher instep. This year, the T2 Eco got an upgrade to the warmer-than-ever Intuition Performance Flex G Women's liner. After a quick heat-molding, it forms to your foot so precisely that it may be more apt to say this boot will embrace you.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa T4 Telemark Boot - 2025
Product.Long_Description: With a minimalist design for touring that gives a tip-of-the-hat to the tele days of yore, the Scarpa T4 Boot is a lightweight offering for tele skiers who are looking for a no-frills ticket to the backcountry. A Pebax shell blends comfort with performance-enhancing stiffness, and the two-buckle design saves weight and hassle on the skintrack. Ergonomic bellows in the forefoot make this boot a reliable partner on the ascent and descent for tele newcomers or those who prefer an old-school ride.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Charmoz Mountaineering Boot - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Scarpa made the Charmoz Mountaineering Boot light and technical for our fast-paced pursuits on long alpine ascents. This fully featured mountaineering boot boasts a light weight, barely exceeding a pound, and it still has all the essentials for the protection and performance we need in high altitudes. A waterproof, breathable HDry insert protects in wet weather, and the shell combines microfiber with synthetic leather for durability and lightness. Underfoot, the Charmoz has a unique quadruple-layered midsole with two dual-layers of cushy EVA and supportive foam in key locations. The Pro-Fiber XT 20 footbed wicks moisture and dries quickly for added comfort when the ascent gets sweaty. Vibram'srubber sole optimizes traction from dirty trails to slippery stones. Although the brand's size chart has recommendations for how to choose your size, customer feedback suggests this shoe runs small, we would suggest sizing up if you are unused to a tight performance fit.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Manta Tech GTX Mountaineering Boot - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Scarpa has been refining the Manta Tech for nearly three decades now, and this current Women's Manta Tech Mountaineering Boot now has Gore-Tex waterproofing to ensure proper weather protection. Not only does this Gore-Tex give waterproof protection, but also provides insulation to keep you warm in higher altitudes. Perwanger's strong suede leather encapsulates the upper for long-lasting durability, and flexible zones eases mobility while walking up and down mountains. Vibram rubber gives the sole solid traction, and it's possible to resole without affecting the boot's semi-automatic crampon compability.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Zodiac Tech GTX Mountaineering Boot - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Zodiac Tech GTX Mountaineering Boot strikes the midway point between an approach shoe and mountain boot for those missions with long approaches and snowy summits. ActivImpact Technology absorbs impacts during your approaches for more comfort on your joints while a Gore-Tex membrane keeps your feet dry as you encounter snow near the summit. The boot's multi-density PU and EVA midsole provides a balance of weight and performance to keep your feet cushioned without weighing your down when the miles get long. Additionally, the Zodiac is outfitted with Scarpa's ActivFit system and Sock-Fit system to reduce bulk and create a snug fit for precision and control on technical ascents. The boot is compatible with semi-automatic crampons for icy traverses and the Vibram soles provide you with durable traction across all the other surfaces you'll encounter.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Zodiac Plus GTX Backpacking Boot - Men's
Product.Long_Description: It's tough to enjoy the journey when we're focused on the slosh and squish that comes with every step. Designed with a waterproof and breathable GORE-TEX membrane, the Scarpa Zodiac Plus GTS Men's Backpacking Boot will keep our feet nice and dry if we take a slider hopping between mossy stones during shallow creek crossings or encounter soggy trail conditions after a rain storm. Scarpa designed the Zodiac Plus with a slightly softer flex than its more mountaineering-focused Zodiac Tech boot, but made this boot slightly more robust than its more trail-focused R-Evolution GTX-the result is a boot that's capable of handling long-haul trail excursions with a heavy backpack but is still flexible enough for peak-bagging missions across scree-covered alpine environments.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Zodiac Plus GTX Backpacking Boot - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Don't let your horoscope dictate how you live your life-pull yourself up by the laces of your Scarpa Women's Zodiac Plus GTX Backpacking Boots, roll up your sleeves, and make your day a good one by exploring evergreen forests, high-mountain meadows, and remote summits. Designed to tackle almost any terrain you encounter as you blaze your own trail (or stick to the developed one), the Zodiac Plus is built with a waterproof and breathable membrane to keep your feet dry when conditions turn wet, and the aggressive Vibram sole gives you the traction necessary to stay upright whether you're hiking slick trails or rocky ridges. Scarpa designed the Zodiac Plus with a slightly stiffer flex than its more mountaineering-focused Zodiac Tech boot, making this boot more trail-friendly than the Zodiac Tech, but a bit more adept at traveling above treeline with a heavy pack than Scarpa's R-Evolution boot. A Perwanger leather upper adds extra resistance against moisture from mushy alpine meadows and the unavoidable creek crossing, and the addition of a rubber rand across the toe and heel ensures that European-crafted leather remains intact when you encounter rocks, roots, and boulders throughout the course of which ever adventure you choose to embark on.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Mescalito TRK GTX Boot - Men's
Product.Long_Description: When we are out in the backcountry, we need a boot to handle the changing conditions we encounter. The Scarpa Mescalito TRK GTX Boot is our go-to boot for hiking and backpacking when the trail calls for a high-top waterproof boot that is as tough as the rocks and dirt we walk over. With an upper made from Perwanger suede and backed by a GORE-TEX membrane, the Mescalito TRK GTX Boot is as tough as they come and offers unrivaled waterproof protection. A Vibram Dynamis Trk and XS Trek Evo tread provides loads of traction in any scenario, and an Ortholite insole cushions our step and reduces fatigue. The dual-density PU midsole helps with shock absorption, and the Schoeller Dynamic fabric at the collar and flex points is a stretch fabric that allows for temperature regulation and is wind and waterproof.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Kailash Trek GTX Hiking Boot - Women's
Product.Long_Description: What Our Gearhead(R) Experts Are Saying:"The Kailash Trek GTX is my go-to boot for long hikes and lightweight backpacking. It hits the perfect balance between support and flexibility, keeping my feet comfortable on long days without feeling too stiff. The waterproof GORE-TEX lining keeps my feet dry in wet conditions, while the Vibram outsole grips everything from loose dirt to slick rock. It's light enough for big mileage days but tough enough for rugged terrain-a great all-around hiking boot."Finding the right balance of comfort, support, and durability is key for long-distance hiking, and the Kailash Trek GTX Hiking Boot delivers. Built with a durable suede and nylon upper, this boot offers flexible mobility without compromising protection. The waterproof and breathable GORE-TEX lining keeps our feet dry through rain-soaked trails and creek crossings, while the Vibram Biometric outsole delivers reliable grip on rugged terrain. Designed for lightweight backpacking and extended hikes, the Kailash Trek GTX features a responsive PU midsole that absorbs shock and provides all-day comfort. Whether we're navigating alpine switchbacks or logging high-mileage days, this boot keeps us moving confidently with the perfect blend of stability and agility.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Kailash Trek GTX Hiking Boot - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Our backpacking trips might miss the brunt of the rainstorm, according to the forecast, but that still means we're trekking on muddy trails with the occasional puddle to circumvent. The forecast can sometimes be unreliable, and we'll end up dealing with a bit of rain anyway, but at least we can rely on the Scarpa Men's Kailash GTX Hiking Boot's waterproofing for rain, mud, and even snow. Its GORE-TEX Performance Comfort membrane provides reliable waterproofing as well as amplified breathability for moving fast on the trail. This boot also boasts Vibram's new Biometric Trek sole, which includes 3D-molded lugs and toe caps for trail-specific traction.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Kailash Trek GTX Hiking Boot - Women's
Product.Long_Description: For treks that keep you on your feet (and maybe under a heavy pack) for days at a time, the Scarpa Women's Kailash Trek GTX Hiking Boot makes the venture a little easier. The suede upper is flexible so your foot doesn't feel restricted, and underneath it has a Gore-Tex lining to keep water out but let air flow. The Kailash Trek has an outsole of Vibram rubber that is specifically designed to grip the trail as conditions change. A Comfort Flex Plus insole sits under your foot, absorbing impact, promoting proper alignment, and providing support as you hike.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Mescalito TRK GTX Hiking Boot - Men's
Product.Long_Description: When scrolling through the trail map app, we don't pick the easy ones. We go for the longest, most strenuous hikes to awe-inspiring locations. That's why we choose the Mescalito TRK GTX Hiking Boot to get us there. The burly leather upper prevents rolled ankles, while a GORE-TEX membrane lets us know our feet will stay dry when crossing rapid rivers. Meanwhile, it sandwiches an Ortholite footbed, PU midsole, and Vibram rubber sole together for sustained comfort and grip throughout.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Guida City GTX Boot - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Stepping into the city doesn't mean we have to leave our function behind, so we count on the Guida City GTX Boot for hitting the town. With grippy rubber soles for traction and a fully waterproof GORE-TEX construction, these are also among our top picks for getting to and from the mountain when ski season is in full swing.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Rush Trail GTX Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Rush Trail GTX Shoe is feature-packed to get the most out of every hike. The waterproof GORE-TEX Extended Comfort lining allows us to hit the trail in any condition, and the durable suede and textile upper protects our feet from loose rocks and low-lying brambles. The IKS impact absorbing domes in the sole minimize shock at the impact points in our feet so that we can push further and stay on our feet longer, and SuperGum outsoles provide excellent grip across highly technical terrain. The DST frame supports our arch and heel, keeping us stable as we scramble up scree fields and climb steep inclines on our way to the summit.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Golden Gate Kima RT Trail Running Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Scarpa engineered the Golden Gate Kima RT Trail Running Shoe for racers and elite mountain runners who gravitate towards the toughest trails. The midsole sandwiches a thin carbon plate in between two layers of EVA foam for support, energy return, shock absorption, and precise foot placement as we navigate technical terrain while the Presa SuperGum outsoles stick to the the trail in dry and wet conditions. The shoe's name comes from its unique uppers, whose mix of synthetic mesh and welded TPU supports were inspired by structural elements of San Francisco's Golden Gate Bridge.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Precision High Liner
Product.Long_Description: When stock ski boot liners just aren't cutting it, turn to the Scarpa Precision High Liner. These wrap style liners boast an Intuition Ultralon foam that is heat moldable to accommodate various needs of skiers of any skill level.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Precision High Liner - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Precision High Liner seamlessly blends warmth, comfort, and performance so we can focus our attention on stomping massive lines and slicing through the trees. The super-light Ultralon foam is super light and warm, and it is heat-moldable to seamlessly fit in our boots and minimize pressure points on our feet. Our feet take us all over place, let's give back to them with a bit of the good life.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Booster Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: Scarpa made the Men's Booster Climbing Shoe for anything overhung at the local gym, sport crag, or boulder field. It has the same aggressive downturn and sharp asymmetry as Scarpa's Boostic Climbing Shoe, except Vibram's XS Grip rubber gives this shoe as softer feel for more sensitivity and friction. It features a unique PAF randing system that prolongs the shoe's downturn and pushes all the power directly to the toe for a technical performance. Expect the microsuede upper to stretch a half size to full size for a customized feel.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Mescalito Planet Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Mescalito Planet Shoe is an approach shoe that provides unmatched comfort, traction, and durability during our technical adventures. The recycled multi-density Prespair upper is abrasion-resistant and highly breathable, while the recycled dual-density EVA midsole offers exceptional shock absorption and stability during each step. To ensure we keep our footing on any surface, Scarpa built the outsole with the Vibram Megagrip rubber compound.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Rush 2 Mid GTX Hiking Boot - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Balancing stability with agility, the Scarpa Rush Mid 2 GTX is a lightweight hiking boot that lets us tear up the trail. The sturdy soles and mid-cut ankle collars give us the support of a hiking boot while the lightweight build is reminiscent of a trail running shoe when we pick up the pace. As always, Scarpa delivers bomber traction with their Presa outsoles, and the GORE-TEX Invisible Fit lining provides waterproof and breathable protection without a traditional waterproof bootie.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Rush 2 Mid GTX Hiking Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Balancing the support of a hiking boot with the agility of a trail running shoe, the Scarpa Rush Mid 2 GTX is a lightweight hiking boot that's made to mow down miles of trails. The Alp-worthy soles and over-the-ankle protection inspire confidence on harder trails while the lightweight mesh uppers keep our weight down for some energy savings when we're hiking fast and light. As we've come to expect from these venerable brands, Scarpa delivers bomber traction with their Presa outsoles, and the new GORE-TEX Invisible Fit lining provides reliable waterproofing and breathability without a traditional waterproof bootie.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Boostic Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: When we're looking for precision on microscopic edges, we pull on Scarpa's Boostic Climbing Shoe. The aggressive downturn and heel-to-toe rand put the power in our toes while the heel's design disperses force for super secure hooks when you're locking off.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Generator V Climbing Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Long days on the wall call for a relaxed fit performance climbing shoe like the Scarpa Generator V Climbing Shoe. With a moderate width, flat profile, and balanced fit, combined with excellent edging capability, and an uncompromising Vibram XS Edge rubber sole, the Generator V Climbing Shoe is perfect for multi-pitch routes and long days of sport climbing. The TRI tension system gives our foot the support it needs under tension, and the PAF heel system spreads out the tension on the heel to improve the fit.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Maverick Mid GTX Hiking Boot - Men's
Product.Long_Description: A lightweight hiking boot that's vegan-friendly, Scarpa's Maverick Mid GTX provides agility and stability for our hiking escapes. The synthetic leather and polyester mesh keep us lighter on our feet, while a GORE-TEX Extended Comfort membrane seals out moisture while letting steamy moisture vapor breathe away. The Maverick may be made for light hiking, but its mid-cut ankle collars and TPU stability shank provide torsional rigidity to protect our feet and ankles as we tackle the trail.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Golden Gate ATR GTX Running Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: From town to trail, the Golden Gate ATR is the ideal choice for those looking for a versatile transitional shoe that is not only comfortable on paved surfaces, but also performs on park paths, gravel roads and groomed single track trails. Our most cushioned shoe to date, the ATR has superior impact absorption capabilities due to it?s iRespond Midsole System, designed to absorb and return energy efficiently. Although the brand's size chart has recommendations for how to choose your size, customer feedback suggests this shoe runs small, we would suggest sizing up if you are unused to a tight performance fit.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Vapor V Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: Upgrade your sending arsenal with Scarpa Men's Vapor V Climbing Shoe before hopping on your lifelong projects again. This shoe focuses on precise footwork over a variety of footholds, both overhung and vertical. Bi-Tension randing reverses standard slingshot randing in order to connect your toe to your heel, instead of uncomfortably bunching your toes towards the front of the shoe. The result is a more powerful performance, assisting any movement from technical static moves to huge dynamic jumps.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Vapor V Climbing Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: We can expect at least one send on those numerous lifelong projects when we upgrade to the Scarpa Vapor V Climbing Shoe. This shoe focuses on precise footwork over a variety of footholds, both overhung and vertical. Bi-Tension randing reverses standard slingshot rands in order to connect toes to heels, instead of uncomfortably bunching toes toward the front of the shoe. The result is a more powerful performance, assisting any movement from technical static moves to huge dynamic jumps.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Mago Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: Lace up the Mago Climbing Shoe as you get ready to send your latest project. Scarpa designed these shoes with Vibram XS Grip2 rubber so that you can weight your feet on those dime edges while gracefully clipping a quickdraw. The asymmetric shape assists with precise footwork, allowing you to pin your foot on tiny footholds with efficiency. For lasting comfort and support, the suede and microsuede upper is form fitting to allow the shoes to fit your feet easily once broken in.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Rush GTX Hiking Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Anchoring Scarpa's new line up of lightweight hikers, the Rush GTX hiking shoe provides plenty of protection without weighing us down. The shoe's Dynamic Stabilizer Torsion frame blend the stability of a hiking shoe with the agility of a trail running shoe, delivering torsional rigidity for foot and ankle support while spoiling our feet with extra EVA foam in high-impact areas for extra comfort and shock absorption. The GORE-TEX Extended Comfort lining keeps our feet dry, not overheated, no matter what the sun and clouds have planned, while the burly TPU overlays and front bumper fend off sticks and stones. The Rush GTX is significantly lighter than traditional Scarpas while still giving us the alp-worthy performance that we've come to expect from this premium Italian brand.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Mojito Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Leading the group up to our favorite boulder in the morning and taking a trip downtown on our fixie afterwards, the Scarpa Mojito Shoes tag along on all our daily adventures without the need to change what's on our feet. When we lace up the Mojito, we experience adaptation in the form of rubber, foam, and suede. The firm Vibram Spyder sole offers lasting durability and sure footing on aggressive trails, while the rubber wrap on the toe lets you mess around on boulders, bounce from rock to rock along river banks, and climb urban walls with solid toe protection.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Quantix SF Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: For a one-shoe quiver, we look to the Quantix SF. Scarpa's innovative single-frame randing technology gives our forefoot a hug, helping the slightly downturned toe find precise placement every time. The full-length sole tapers toward the back, bringing us a little flexibility for solid smears, while the hardwearing rubber gives us max grip for edges and slopers.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Mojito Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: When is a casual shoe also capable of approach hikes and belay duty? When it's the Scarpa Women's Mojito Shoe. This stylish crossover features a tough leather upper and sticky Vibram Spyder outsole that can tackle any day at the crags without sacrificing its casual looks. A reinforced arch and EVA midsole provide cushioning for the long day and subsequent night on the town.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Quantix SF Climbing Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Our wide variety of climbing styles are easily accommodated with the Scarpa Quantix SF Climbing Shoe. Along with offering a soft, suede-like synthetic upper that doesn't stretch out too much, this shoe uses Vibram rubber for a sticky and secure hold on plastic and real rock.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Gecko Approach Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Sometimes the walk-off is the crux, which is why we trust Scarpa's Gecko Approach Shoe to grip the rocky terrain on the way back to the car. The durable suede upper is soft and flexible, making the break-in time speedy for comfortable wear on steep inclines while the sticky sole bites exposed edges.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Quantic Climbing Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: Our wide spectrum of climbing preferences require the versatility and high performance of the Quantic Climbing Shoe. Its slight downturn and full-length outsole are balanced with the soft, flexible upper, making it a great choice for technical face climbs and overhung routes alike. Since this version has a lower volume fit than the men's shoe, it's designed for a narrow foot and less pronounced heel.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Quantic Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: After a long day of sending emails and attending video meetings, we're always stoked for a solid gym session in our Quantic Climbing Shoe. Its slight downturn and full-length sole transitions seamlessly from the sport wall to the bouldering cave, keeping us in training mode without limiting our options.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Rapid Approach Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: Designed with trail running in mind, the Scarpa Rapid Approach Shoe keeps our pace quick and secure on the trail. Since it features Vibram Agility rubber, our traction over boulders and across creeks is supremely reliable. Constructed with lightweight materials and offering flexible arch support, these trekkers keep our feet and calves from getting spent before they even get on the wall.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Force V Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: Slip into Scarpa's Force V Climbing Shoe when you start tackling overhung climbs whether you're bouldering or sport climbing. An ideal introduction to the steeps, this flat climbing kicker has a comfortable asymmetry so you don't feel pain while you learn how to fight gravity. Scarpa left the smooth, soft, stretchy suede leather upper unlined for a conforming fit. Underfoot, the Force V features a sensitive Flexan midsole and Vibram's XS Edge rubber at the sole for optimized traction and long-lasting durability.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Gecko Lite Approach Shoe - Men's
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Gecko Lite Approach Shoe offers the precision and grip we need to reach our favorite climbing location. The Presa APR-01 sole offers superior grip and stiffness, while the combination of a precise last and extended lacing delivers sensitivity and a perfect connection between the approach and climbing.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Force V Climbing Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: You dream of a life lived solely in the vertical world where work is a couple pitches below, projects are a couple pitches above, and even the grocery store is a traverse away. If you're going to spend the rest of your life up there, you're going to need a comfy pair of shoes with a harmonious blend of comfort and performance. Despite its slight asymmetry and flat profile, the Scarpa Women's Force V Climbing Shoe is surprisingly performance-driven for how comfy it feels. Sure it isn't going to succeed on the steep overhangs, but it can handle slab, crack, and vertical edging like a champ. The Vibram XS Edge rubber sole assures solid traction for seasons, and the V-Tension Active Randing maintains a solid profile throughout. How's that for harmonious?

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Crux Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Women's Scarpa Crux Shoe shows that you need not worry about scrambles or loose scree as you approach the crag. Suede and recycled polyester airmesh encourages natural ventilation, with Kevlar webbing integrated for shape retention and durability. The Vibram Vertical Approach sole keeps your footing confident through sketchy scrambles, with a dual-density EVA midsole adding comfort to tough approaches and low-level climbs. A member of Scarpa's Planet Friendly initiative to support more sustainable manufacturing practices, the Crux helps you get to the crag with confidence and a clearer conscience.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Reflex V Climbing Shoe - Women's
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Women's Reflex V is a modern climbing shoe constructed for beginners taking their first steps in the vertical world. Scarpa's new Zonal stretch knit upper is built with enough breathability when the gym is warm, and it's washable and supportive enough for starters to wear comfortably. The Reflex V has a flat, slightly asymmetric profile that provides a touch of performance as well as extreme comfort. Vision rubber grants durable traction that's sure to last as you learn how to climb.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Reflex V Climbing Shoe
Product.Long_Description: The Reflex V Climbing Shoe is a modern climber constructed for beginners taking their first steps in the vertical world. Scarpa's new Zonal stretch knit upper is built with enough breathability when the gym is warm, and it's washable and supportive enough for starters to wear comfortably. The Reflex V has a flat, slightly asymmetric profile that provides a touch of performance as well as extreme comfort. Vision rubber grants durable traction that's sure to last as you learn how to climb.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Reflex Climbing Shoe - Kids'
Product.Long_Description: After one day at the climbing gym, our little sender is hooked, so we pick up a pair of the Scarpa Reflex Climbing Shoe, knowing they'll be joining us at the gym and crag whenever they can. The neutral profile protects against the damage too-tight, too-aggressive shoes can have on developing feet, while the elasticated knit upper lets their feet flex and breathe freely. Equipped with Scarpa's innovative PAF system, this pair reduces tension on their Achilles, allowing a softer rubber to mold to their heel for a snug yet low-pressure fit. As they play with driving through their toes at different angles and on different holds, the sticky, resilient rubber gives their feet reliable bite on both plastic and rock.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Maestrale RS Alpine Touring Boot - 2023
Product.Long_Description: Positioned among the top-tier freeride boots in Scarpa's line, we bust out the Maestrale RS Alpine Touring Boot for those backcountry skiing missions where we can't accept a compromise. The walk mode is designed to function with minimal friction and offers an incredible 60-degrees of cuff rotation for efficient skinning through the approach, and up the ascent. The 125 flex and Grilamid shell offer alpine boot-inspired descending characteristics, with both fore-and-aft and lateral stiffness that rewards hard-charging skiers. Stiff and swift is the name of the game, the RS version of the Maestrale only suffers from a 40 gram weight penalty, yet is twenty percent stiffer for those steep and deep days in the mountains.
